41#include "precomp.hpp"
42#include <ctype.h>
43
44using namespace cv;
45
46static const float ord_nan = FLT_MAX*0.5f;
47static const int min_block_size = 1 << 16;
48static const int block_size_delta = 1 << 10;
49
50CvDTreeTrainData::CvDTreeTrainData()
51{
52 var_idx = var_type = cat_count = cat_ofs = cat_map =
53 priors = priors_mult = counts = direction = split_buf = responses_copy = 0;
54 buf = 0;
55 tree_storage = temp_storage = 0;
56
57 clear();
58}
59
60
61CvDTreeTrainData::CvDTreeTrainData( const CvMat* _train_data, int _tflag,
62 const CvMat* _responses, const CvMat* _var_idx,
63 const CvMat* _sample_idx, const CvMat* _var_type,
64 const CvMat* _missing_mask, const CvDTreeParams& _params,
65 bool _shared, bool _add_labels )
66{
67 var_idx = var_type = cat_count = cat_ofs = cat_map =
68 priors = priors_mult = counts = direction = split_buf = responses_copy = 0;
69 buf = 0;
70
71 tree_storage = temp_storage = 0;
72
73 set_data( _train_data, _tflag, _responses, _var_idx, _sample_idx,
74 _var_type, _missing_mask, _params, _shared, _add_labels );
75}
76
77
78CvDTreeTrainData::~CvDTreeTrainData()
79{
80 clear();
81}
82
83
84bool CvDTreeTrainData::set_params( const CvDTreeParams& _params )
85{
86 bool ok = false;
87
88 CV_FUNCNAME( "CvDTreeTrainData::set_params" );
89
90 __BEGIN__;
91
92 // set parameters
93 params = _params;
94
95 if( params.max_categories < 2 )
96 CV_ERROR( CV_StsOutOfRange, "params.max_categories should be >= 2" );
97 params.max_categories = MIN( params.max_categories, 15 );
98
99 if( params.max_depth < 0 )
100 CV_ERROR( CV_StsOutOfRange, "params.max_depth should be >= 0" );
101 params.max_depth = MIN( params.max_depth, 25 );
102
103 params.min_sample_count = MAX(params.min_sample_count,1);
104
105 if( params.cv_folds < 0 )
106 CV_ERROR( CV_StsOutOfRange,
107 "params.cv_folds should be =0 (the tree is not pruned) "
108 "or n>0 (tree is pruned using n-fold cross-validation)" );
109
110 if( params.cv_folds == 1 )
111 params.cv_folds = 0;
112
113 if( params.regression_accuracy < 0 )
114 CV_ERROR( CV_StsOutOfRange, "params.regression_accuracy should be >= 0" );
115
116 ok = true;
117
118 __END__;
119
120 return ok;
121}
122
123#define CV_CMP_NUM_PTR(a,b) (*(a) < *(b))
124static CV_IMPLEMENT_QSORT_EX( icvSortIntPtr, int*, CV_CMP_NUM_PTR, int )
125static CV_IMPLEMENT_QSORT_EX( icvSortDblPtr, double*, CV_CMP_NUM_PTR, int )
126
127#define CV_CMP_NUM_IDX(i,j) (aux[i] < aux[j])
128static CV_IMPLEMENT_QSORT_EX( icvSortIntAux, int, CV_CMP_NUM_IDX, const float* )
129static CV_IMPLEMENT_QSORT_EX( icvSortUShAux, unsigned short, CV_CMP_NUM_IDX, const float* )
130
131#define CV_CMP_PAIRS(a,b) (*((a).i) < *((b).i))
132static CV_IMPLEMENT_QSORT_EX( icvSortPairs, CvPair16u32s, CV_CMP_PAIRS, int )
133
134void CvDTreeTrainData::set_data( const CvMat* _train_data, int _tflag,
135 const CvMat* _responses, const CvMat* _var_idx, const CvMat* _sample_idx,
136 const CvMat* _var_type, const CvMat* _missing_mask, const CvDTreeParams& _params,
137 bool _shared, bool _add_labels, bool _update_data )
138{
139 CvMat* sample_indices = 0;
140 CvMat* var_type0 = 0;
141 CvMat* tmp_map = 0;
142 int** int_ptr = 0;
143 CvPair16u32s* pair16u32s_ptr = 0;
144 CvDTreeTrainData* data = 0;
145 float *_fdst = 0;
146 int *_idst = 0;
147 unsigned short* udst = 0;
148 int* idst = 0;
149
150 CV_FUNCNAME( "CvDTreeTrainData::set_data" );
151
152 __BEGIN__;
153
154 int sample_all = 0, r_type, cv_n;
155 int total_c_count = 0;
156 int tree_block_size, temp_block_size, max_split_size, nv_size, cv_size = 0;
157 int ds_step, dv_step, ms_step = 0, mv_step = 0; // {data|mask}{sample|var}_step
158 int vi, i, size;
159 char err[100];
160 const int *sidx = 0, *vidx = 0;
161
162 uint64 effective_buf_size = 0;
163 int effective_buf_height = 0, effective_buf_width = 0;
164
165 if( _update_data && data_root )
166 {
167 data = new CvDTreeTrainData( _train_data, _tflag, _responses, _var_idx,
168 _sample_idx, _var_type, _missing_mask, _params, _shared, _add_labels );
169
170 // compare new and old train data
171 if( !(data->var_count == var_count &&
172 cvNorm( data->var_type, var_type, CV_C ) < FLT_EPSILON &&
173 cvNorm( data->cat_count, cat_count, CV_C ) < FLT_EPSILON &&
174 cvNorm( data->cat_map, cat_map, CV_C ) < FLT_EPSILON) )
175 CV_ERROR( CV_StsBadArg,
176 "The new training data must have the same types and the input and output variables "
177 "and the same categories for categorical variables" );
178
179 cvReleaseMat( &priors );
180 cvReleaseMat( &priors_mult );
181 cvReleaseMat( &buf );
182 cvReleaseMat( &direction );
183 cvReleaseMat( &split_buf );
184 cvReleaseMemStorage( &temp_storage );
185
186 priors = data->priors; data->priors = 0;
187 priors_mult = data->priors_mult; data->priors_mult = 0;
188 buf = data->buf; data->buf = 0;
189 buf_count = data->buf_count; buf_size = data->buf_size;
190 sample_count = data->sample_count;
191
192 direction = data->direction; data->direction = 0;
193 split_buf = data->split_buf; data->split_buf = 0;
194 temp_storage = data->temp_storage; data->temp_storage = 0;
195 nv_heap = data->nv_heap; cv_heap = data->cv_heap;
196
197 data_root = new_node( 0, sample_count, 0, 0 );
198 EXIT;
199 }
200
201 clear();
202
203 var_all = 0;
204 rng = &cv::theRNG();
205
206 CV_CALL( set_params( _params ));
207
208 // check parameter types and sizes
209 CV_CALL( cvCheckTrainData( _train_data, _tflag, _missing_mask, &var_all, &sample_all ));
210
211 train_data = _train_data;
212 responses = _responses;
213
214 if( _tflag == CV_ROW_SAMPLE )
215 {
216 ds_step = _train_data->step/CV_ELEM_SIZE(_train_data->type);
217 dv_step = 1;
218 if( _missing_mask )
219 ms_step = _missing_mask->step, mv_step = 1;
220 }
221 else
222 {
223 dv_step = _train_data->step/CV_ELEM_SIZE(_train_data->type);
224 ds_step = 1;
225 if( _missing_mask )
226 mv_step = _missing_mask->step, ms_step = 1;
227 }
228 tflag = _tflag;
229
230 sample_count = sample_all;
231 var_count = var_all;
232
233 if( _sample_idx )
234 {
235 CV_CALL( sample_indices = cvPreprocessIndexArray( _sample_idx, sample_all ));
236 sidx = sample_indices->data.i;
237 sample_count = sample_indices->rows + sample_indices->cols - 1;
238 }
239
240 if( _var_idx )
241 {
242 CV_CALL( var_idx = cvPreprocessIndexArray( _var_idx, var_all ));
243 vidx = var_idx->data.i;
244 var_count = var_idx->rows + var_idx->cols - 1;
245 }
246
247 is_buf_16u = false;
248 if ( sample_count < 65536 )
249 is_buf_16u = true;
250
251 if( !CV_IS_MAT(_responses) ||
252 (CV_MAT_TYPE(_responses->type) != CV_32SC1 &&
253 CV_MAT_TYPE(_responses->type) != CV_32FC1) ||
254 (_responses->rows != 1 && _responses->cols != 1) ||
255 _responses->rows + _responses->cols - 1 != sample_all )
256 CV_ERROR( CV_StsBadArg, "The array of _responses must be an integer or "
257 "floating-point vector containing as many elements as "
258 "the total number of samples in the training data matrix" );
259
260 r_type = CV_VAR_CATEGORICAL;
261 if( _var_type )
262 CV_CALL( var_type0 = cvPreprocessVarType( _var_type, var_idx, var_count, &r_type ));
263
264 CV_CALL( var_type = cvCreateMat( 1, var_count+2, CV_32SC1 ));
265
266 cat_var_count = 0;
267 ord_var_count = -1;
268
269 is_classifier = r_type == CV_VAR_CATEGORICAL;
270
271 // step 0. calc the number of categorical vars
272 for( vi = 0; vi < var_count; vi++ )
273 {
274 char vt = var_type0 ? var_type0->data.ptr[vi] : CV_VAR_ORDERED;
275 var_type->data.i[vi] = vt == CV_VAR_CATEGORICAL ? cat_var_count++ : ord_var_count--;
276 }
277
278 ord_var_count = ~ord_var_count;
279 cv_n = params.cv_folds;
280 // set the two last elements of var_type array to be able
281 // to locate responses and cross-validation labels using
282 // the corresponding get_* functions.
283 var_type->data.i[var_count] = cat_var_count;
284 var_type->data.i[var_count+1] = cat_var_count+1;
285
286 // in case of single ordered predictor we need dummy cv_labels
287 // for safe split_node_data() operation
288 have_labels = cv_n > 0 || (ord_var_count == 1 && cat_var_count == 0) || _add_labels;
289
290 work_var_count = var_count + (is_classifier ? 1 : 0) // for responses class_labels
291 + (have_labels ? 1 : 0); // for cv_labels
292
293 shared = _shared;
294 buf_count = shared ? 2 : 1;
295
296 buf_size = -1; // the member buf_size is obsolete
297
298 effective_buf_size = (uint64)(work_var_count + 1)*(uint64)sample_count * buf_count; // this is the total size of "CvMat buf" to be allocated
299 effective_buf_width = sample_count;
300 effective_buf_height = work_var_count+1;
301
302 if (effective_buf_width >= effective_buf_height)
303 effective_buf_height *= buf_count;
304 else
305 effective_buf_width *= buf_count;
306
307 if ((uint64)effective_buf_width * (uint64)effective_buf_height != effective_buf_size)
308 {
309 CV_Error(CV_StsBadArg, "The memory buffer cannot be allocated since its size exceeds integer fields limit");
310 }
311
312
313
314 if ( is_buf_16u )
315 {
316 CV_CALL( buf = cvCreateMat( effective_buf_height, effective_buf_width, CV_16UC1 ));
317 CV_CALL( pair16u32s_ptr = (CvPair16u32s*)cvAlloc( sample_count*sizeof(pair16u32s_ptr[0]) ));
318 }
319 else
320 {
321 CV_CALL( buf = cvCreateMat( effective_buf_height, effective_buf_width, CV_32SC1 ));
322 CV_CALL( int_ptr = (int**)cvAlloc( sample_count*sizeof(int_ptr[0]) ));
323 }
324
325 size = is_classifier ? (cat_var_count+1) : cat_var_count;
326 size = !size ? 1 : size;
327 CV_CALL( cat_count = cvCreateMat( 1, size, CV_32SC1 ));
328 CV_CALL( cat_ofs = cvCreateMat( 1, size, CV_32SC1 ));
329
330 size = is_classifier ? (cat_var_count + 1)*params.max_categories : cat_var_count*params.max_categories;
331 size = !size ? 1 : size;
332 CV_CALL( cat_map = cvCreateMat( 1, size, CV_32SC1 ));
333
334 // now calculate the maximum size of split,
335 // create memory storage that will keep nodes and splits of the decision tree
336 // allocate root node and the buffer for the whole training data
337 max_split_size = cvAlign(sizeof(CvDTreeSplit) +
338 (MAX(0,sample_count - 33)/32)*sizeof(int),sizeof(void*));
339 tree_block_size = MAX((int)sizeof(CvDTreeNode)*8, max_split_size);
340 tree_block_size = MAX(tree_block_size + block_size_delta, min_block_size);
341 CV_CALL( tree_storage = cvCreateMemStorage( tree_block_size ));
342 CV_CALL( node_heap = cvCreateSet( 0, sizeof(*node_heap), sizeof(CvDTreeNode), tree_storage ));
343
344 nv_size = var_count*sizeof(int);
345 nv_size = cvAlign(MAX( nv_size, (int)sizeof(CvSetElem) ), sizeof(void*));
346
347 temp_block_size = nv_size;
348
349 if( cv_n )
350 {
351 if( sample_count < cv_n*MAX(params.min_sample_count,10) )
352 CV_ERROR( CV_StsOutOfRange,
353 "The many folds in cross-validation for such a small dataset" );
354
355 cv_size = cvAlign( cv_n*(sizeof(int) + sizeof(double)*2), sizeof(double) );
356 temp_block_size = MAX(temp_block_size, cv_size);
357 }
358
359 temp_block_size = MAX( temp_block_size + block_size_delta, min_block_size );
360 CV_CALL( temp_storage = cvCreateMemStorage( temp_block_size ));
361 CV_CALL( nv_heap = cvCreateSet( 0, sizeof(*nv_heap), nv_size, temp_storage ));
362 if( cv_size )
363 CV_CALL( cv_heap = cvCreateSet( 0, sizeof(*cv_heap), cv_size, temp_storage ));
364
365 CV_CALL( data_root = new_node( 0, sample_count, 0, 0 ));
366
367 max_c_count = 1;
368
369 _fdst = 0;
370 _idst = 0;
371 if (ord_var_count)
372 _fdst = (float*)cvAlloc(sample_count*sizeof(_fdst[0]));
373 if (is_buf_16u && (cat_var_count || is_classifier))
374 _idst = (int*)cvAlloc(sample_count*sizeof(_idst[0]));
375
376 // transform the training data to convenient representation
377 for( vi = 0; vi <= var_count; vi++ )
378 {
379 int ci;
380 const uchar* mask = 0;
381 int64 m_step = 0, step;
382 const int* idata = 0;
383 const float* fdata = 0;
384 int num_valid = 0;
385
386 if( vi < var_count ) // analyze i-th input variable
387 {
388 int vi0 = vidx ? vidx[vi] : vi;
389 ci = get_var_type(vi);
390 step = ds_step; m_step = ms_step;
391 if( CV_MAT_TYPE(_train_data->type) == CV_32SC1 )
392 idata = _train_data->data.i + vi0*dv_step;
393 else
394 fdata = _train_data->data.fl + vi0*dv_step;
395 if( _missing_mask )
396 mask = _missing_mask->data.ptr + vi0*mv_step;
397 }
398 else // analyze _responses
399 {
400 ci = cat_var_count;
401 step = CV_IS_MAT_CONT(_responses->type) ?
402 1 : _responses->step / CV_ELEM_SIZE(_responses->type);
403 if( CV_MAT_TYPE(_responses->type) == CV_32SC1 )
404 idata = _responses->data.i;
405 else
406 fdata = _responses->data.fl;
407 }
408
409 if( (vi < var_count && ci>=0) ||
410 (vi == var_count && is_classifier) ) // process categorical variable or response
411 {
412 int c_count, prev_label;
413 int* c_map;
414
415 if (is_buf_16u)
416 udst = (unsigned short*)(buf->data.s + vi*sample_count);
417 else
418 idst = buf->data.i + vi*sample_count;
419
420 // copy data
421 for( i = 0; i < sample_count; i++ )
422 {
423 int val = INT_MAX, si = sidx ? sidx[i] : i;
424 if( !mask || !mask[(size_t)si*m_step] )
425 {
426 if( idata )
427 val = idata[(size_t)si*step];
428 else
429 {
430 float t = fdata[(size_t)si*step];
431 val = cvRound(t);
432 if( fabs(t - val) > FLT_EPSILON )
433 {
434 sprintf( err, "%d-th value of %d-th (categorical) "
435 "variable is not an integer", i, vi );
436 CV_ERROR( CV_StsBadArg, err );
437 }
438 }
439
440 if( val == INT_MAX )
441 {
442 sprintf( err, "%d-th value of %d-th (categorical) "
443 "variable is too large", i, vi );
444 CV_ERROR( CV_StsBadArg, err );
445 }
446 num_valid++;
447 }
448 if (is_buf_16u)
449 {
450 _idst[i] = val;
451 pair16u32s_ptr[i].u = udst + i;
452 pair16u32s_ptr[i].i = _idst + i;
453 }
454 else
455 {
456 idst[i] = val;
457 int_ptr[i] = idst + i;
458 }
459 }
460
461 c_count = num_valid > 0;
462 if (is_buf_16u)
463 {
464 icvSortPairs( pair16u32s_ptr, sample_count, 0 );
465 // count the categories
466 for( i = 1; i < num_valid; i++ )
467 if (*pair16u32s_ptr[i].i != *pair16u32s_ptr[i-1].i)
468 c_count ++ ;
469 }
470 else
471 {
472 icvSortIntPtr( int_ptr, sample_count, 0 );
473 // count the categories
474 for( i = 1; i < num_valid; i++ )
475 c_count += *int_ptr[i] != *int_ptr[i-1];
476 }
477
478 if( vi > 0 )
479 max_c_count = MAX( max_c_count, c_count );
480 cat_count->data.i[ci] = c_count;
481 cat_ofs->data.i[ci] = total_c_count;
482
483 // resize cat_map, if need
484 if( cat_map->cols < total_c_count + c_count )
485 {
486 tmp_map = cat_map;
487 CV_CALL( cat_map = cvCreateMat( 1,
488 MAX(cat_map->cols*3/2,total_c_count+c_count), CV_32SC1 ));
489 for( i = 0; i < total_c_count; i++ )
490 cat_map->data.i[i] = tmp_map->data.i[i];
491 cvReleaseMat( &tmp_map );
492 }
493
494 c_map = cat_map->data.i + total_c_count;
495 total_c_count += c_count;
496
497 c_count = -1;
498 if (is_buf_16u)
499 {
500 // compact the class indices and build the map
501 prev_label = ~*pair16u32s_ptr[0].i;
502 for( i = 0; i < num_valid; i++ )
503 {
504 int cur_label = *pair16u32s_ptr[i].i;
505 if( cur_label != prev_label )
506 c_map[++c_count] = prev_label = cur_label;
507 *pair16u32s_ptr[i].u = (unsigned short)c_count;
508 }
509 // replace labels for missing values with -1
510 for( ; i < sample_count; i++ )
511 *pair16u32s_ptr[i].u = 65535;
512 }
513 else
514 {
515 // compact the class indices and build the map
516 prev_label = ~*int_ptr[0];
517 for( i = 0; i < num_valid; i++ )
518 {
519 int cur_label = *int_ptr[i];
520 if( cur_label != prev_label )
521 c_map[++c_count] = prev_label = cur_label;
522 *int_ptr[i] = c_count;
523 }
524 // replace labels for missing values with -1
525 for( ; i < sample_count; i++ )
526 *int_ptr[i] = -1;
527 }
528 }
529 else if( ci < 0 ) // process ordered variable
530 {
531 if (is_buf_16u)
532 udst = (unsigned short*)(buf->data.s + vi*sample_count);
533 else
534 idst = buf->data.i + vi*sample_count;
535
536 for( i = 0; i < sample_count; i++ )
537 {
538 float val = ord_nan;
539 int si = sidx ? sidx[i] : i;
540 if( !mask || !mask[(size_t)si*m_step] )
541 {
542 if( idata )
543 val = (float)idata[(size_t)si*step];
544 else
545 val = fdata[(size_t)si*step];
546
547 if( fabs(val) >= ord_nan )
548 {
549 sprintf( err, "%d-th value of %d-th (ordered) "
550 "variable (=%g) is too large", i, vi, val );
551 CV_ERROR( CV_StsBadArg, err );
552 }
553 num_valid++;
554 }
555
556 if (is_buf_16u)
557 udst[i] = (unsigned short)i; // TODO: memory corruption may be here
558 else
559 idst[i] = i;
560 _fdst[i] = val;
561
562 }
563 if (is_buf_16u)
564 icvSortUShAux( udst, sample_count, _fdst);
565 else
566 icvSortIntAux( idst, sample_count, _fdst );
567 }
568
569 if( vi < var_count )
570 data_root->set_num_valid(vi, num_valid);
571 }
572
573 // set sample labels
574 if (is_buf_16u)
575 udst = (unsigned short*)(buf->data.s + work_var_count*sample_count);
576 else
577 idst = buf->data.i + work_var_count*sample_count;
578
579 for (i = 0; i < sample_count; i++)
580 {
581 if (udst)
582 udst[i] = sidx ? (unsigned short)sidx[i] : (unsigned short)i;
583 else
584 idst[i] = sidx ? sidx[i] : i;
585 }
586
587 if( cv_n )
588 {
589 unsigned short* usdst = 0;
590 int* idst2 = 0;
591
592 if (is_buf_16u)
593 {
594 usdst = (unsigned short*)(buf->data.s + (get_work_var_count()-1)*sample_count);
595 for( i = vi = 0; i < sample_count; i++ )
596 {
597 usdst[i] = (unsigned short)vi++;
598 vi &= vi < cv_n ? -1 : 0;
599 }
600
601 for( i = 0; i < sample_count; i++ )
602 {
603 int a = (*rng)(sample_count);
604 int b = (*rng)(sample_count);
605 unsigned short unsh = (unsigned short)vi;
606 CV_SWAP( usdst[a], usdst[b], unsh );
607 }
608 }
609 else
610 {
611 idst2 = buf->data.i + (get_work_var_count()-1)*sample_count;
612 for( i = vi = 0; i < sample_count; i++ )
613 {
614 idst2[i] = vi++;
615 vi &= vi < cv_n ? -1 : 0;
616 }
617
618 for( i = 0; i < sample_count; i++ )
619 {
620 int a = (*rng)(sample_count);
621 int b = (*rng)(sample_count);
622 CV_SWAP( idst2[a], idst2[b], vi );
623 }
624 }
625 }
626
627 if ( cat_map )
628 cat_map->cols = MAX( total_c_count, 1 );
629
630 max_split_size = cvAlign(sizeof(CvDTreeSplit) +
631 (MAX(0,max_c_count - 33)/32)*sizeof(int),sizeof(void*));
632 CV_CALL( split_heap = cvCreateSet( 0, sizeof(*split_heap), max_split_size, tree_storage ));
633
634 have_priors = is_classifier && params.priors;
635 if( is_classifier )
636 {
637 int m = get_num_classes();
638 double sum = 0;
639 CV_CALL( priors = cvCreateMat( 1, m, CV_64F ));
640 for( i = 0; i < m; i++ )
641 {
642 double val = have_priors ? params.priors[i] : 1.;
643 if( val <= 0 )
644 CV_ERROR( CV_StsOutOfRange, "Every class weight should be positive" );
645 priors->data.db[i] = val;
646 sum += val;
647 }
648
649 // normalize weights
650 if( have_priors )
651 cvScale( priors, priors, 1./sum );
652
653 CV_CALL( priors_mult = cvCloneMat( priors ));
654 CV_CALL( counts = cvCreateMat( 1, m, CV_32SC1 ));
655 }
656
657
658 CV_CALL( direction = cvCreateMat( 1, sample_count, CV_8UC1 ));
659 CV_CALL( split_buf = cvCreateMat( 1, sample_count, CV_32SC1 ));
660
661 __END__;
662
663 if( data )
664 delete data;
665
666 if (_fdst)
667 cvFree( &_fdst );
668 if (_idst)
669 cvFree( &_idst );
670 cvFree( &int_ptr );
671 cvFree( &pair16u32s_ptr);
672 cvReleaseMat( &var_type0 );
673 cvReleaseMat( &sample_indices );
674 cvReleaseMat( &tmp_map );
675}
676
677void CvDTreeTrainData::do_responses_copy()
678{
679 responses_copy = cvCreateMat( responses->rows, responses->cols, responses->type );
680 cvCopy( responses, responses_copy);
681 responses = responses_copy;
682}
683
684CvDTreeNode* CvDTreeTrainData::subsample_data( const CvMat* _subsample_idx )
685{
686 CvDTreeNode* root = 0;
687 CvMat* isubsample_idx = 0;
688 CvMat* subsample_co = 0;
689
690 bool isMakeRootCopy = true;
691
692 CV_FUNCNAME( "CvDTreeTrainData::subsample_data" );
693
694 __BEGIN__;
695
696 if( !data_root )
697 CV_ERROR( CV_StsError, "No training data has been set" );
698
699 if( _subsample_idx )
700 {
701 CV_CALL( isubsample_idx = cvPreprocessIndexArray( _subsample_idx, sample_count ));
702
703 if( isubsample_idx->cols + isubsample_idx->rows - 1 == sample_count )
704 {
705 const int* sidx = isubsample_idx->data.i;
706 for( int i = 0; i < sample_count; i++ )
707 {
708 if( sidx[i] != i )
709 {
710 isMakeRootCopy = false;
711 break;
712 }
713 }
714 }
715 else
716 isMakeRootCopy = false;
717 }
718
719 if( isMakeRootCopy )
720 {
721 // make a copy of the root node
722 CvDTreeNode temp;
723 int i;
724 root = new_node( 0, 1, 0, 0 );
725 temp = *root;
726 *root = *data_root;
727 root->num_valid = temp.num_valid;
728 if( root->num_valid )
729 {
730 for( i = 0; i < var_count; i++ )
731 root->num_valid[i] = data_root->num_valid[i];
732 }
733 root->cv_Tn = temp.cv_Tn;
734 root->cv_node_risk = temp.cv_node_risk;
735 root->cv_node_error = temp.cv_node_error;
736 }
737 else
738 {
739 int* sidx = isubsample_idx->data.i;
740 // co - array of count/offset pairs (to handle duplicated values in _subsample_idx)
741 int* co, cur_ofs = 0;
742 int vi, i;
743 int workVarCount = get_work_var_count();
744 int count = isubsample_idx->rows + isubsample_idx->cols - 1;
745
746 root = new_node( 0, count, 1, 0 );
747
748 CV_CALL( subsample_co = cvCreateMat( 1, sample_count*2, CV_32SC1 ));
749 cvZero( subsample_co );
750 co = subsample_co->data.i;
751 for( i = 0; i < count; i++ )
752 co[sidx[i]*2]++;
753 for( i = 0; i < sample_count; i++ )
754 {
755 if( co[i*2] )
756 {
757 co[i*2+1] = cur_ofs;
758 cur_ofs += co[i*2];
759 }
760 else
761 co[i*2+1] = -1;
762 }
763
764 cv::AutoBuffer<uchar> inn_buf(sample_count*(2*sizeof(int) + sizeof(float)));
765 for( vi = 0; vi < workVarCount; vi++ )
766 {
767 int ci = get_var_type(vi);
768
769 if( ci >= 0 || vi >= var_count )
770 {
771 int num_valid = 0;
772 const int* src = CvDTreeTrainData::get_cat_var_data( data_root, vi, (int*)(uchar*)inn_buf );
773
774 if (is_buf_16u)
775 {
776 unsigned short* udst = (unsigned short*)(buf->data.s + root->buf_idx*get_length_subbuf() +
777 vi*sample_count + root->offset);
778 for( i = 0; i < count; i++ )
779 {
780 int val = src[sidx[i]];
781 udst[i] = (unsigned short)val;
782 num_valid += val >= 0;
783 }
784 }
785 else
786 {
787 int* idst = buf->data.i + root->buf_idx*get_length_subbuf() +
788 vi*sample_count + root->offset;
789 for( i = 0; i < count; i++ )
790 {
791 int val = src[sidx[i]];
792 idst[i] = val;
793 num_valid += val >= 0;
794 }
795 }
796
797 if( vi < var_count )
798 root->set_num_valid(vi, num_valid);
799 }
800 else
801 {
802 int *src_idx_buf = (int*)(uchar*)inn_buf;
803 float *src_val_buf = (float*)(src_idx_buf + sample_count);
804 int* sample_indices_buf = (int*)(src_val_buf + sample_count);
805 const int* src_idx = 0;
806 const float* src_val = 0;
807 get_ord_var_data( data_root, vi, src_val_buf, src_idx_buf, &src_val, &src_idx, sample_indices_buf );
808 int j = 0, idx, count_i;
809 int num_valid = data_root->get_num_valid(vi);
810
811 if (is_buf_16u)
812 {
813 unsigned short* udst_idx = (unsigned short*)(buf->data.s + root->buf_idx*get_length_subbuf() +
814 vi*sample_count + data_root->offset);
815 for( i = 0; i < num_valid; i++ )
816 {
817 idx = src_idx[i];
818 count_i = co[idx*2];
819 if( count_i )
820 for( cur_ofs = co[idx*2+1]; count_i > 0; count_i--, j++, cur_ofs++ )
821 udst_idx[j] = (unsigned short)cur_ofs;
822 }
823
824 root->set_num_valid(vi, j);
825
826 for( ; i < sample_count; i++ )
827 {
828 idx = src_idx[i];
829 count_i = co[idx*2];
830 if( count_i )
831 for( cur_ofs = co[idx*2+1]; count_i > 0; count_i--, j++, cur_ofs++ )
832 udst_idx[j] = (unsigned short)cur_ofs;
833 }
834 }
835 else
836 {
837 int* idst_idx = buf->data.i + root->buf_idx*get_length_subbuf() +
838 vi*sample_count + root->offset;
839 for( i = 0; i < num_valid; i++ )
840 {
841 idx = src_idx[i];
842 count_i = co[idx*2];
843 if( count_i )
844 for( cur_ofs = co[idx*2+1]; count_i > 0; count_i--, j++, cur_ofs++ )
845 idst_idx[j] = cur_ofs;
846 }
847
848 root->set_num_valid(vi, j);
849
850 for( ; i < sample_count; i++ )
851 {
852 idx = src_idx[i];
853 count_i = co[idx*2];
854 if( count_i )
855 for( cur_ofs = co[idx*2+1]; count_i > 0; count_i--, j++, cur_ofs++ )
856 idst_idx[j] = cur_ofs;
857 }
858 }
859 }
860 }
861 // sample indices subsampling
862 const int* sample_idx_src = get_sample_indices(data_root, (int*)(uchar*)inn_buf);
863 if (is_buf_16u)
864 {
865 unsigned short* sample_idx_dst = (unsigned short*)(buf->data.s + root->buf_idx*get_length_subbuf() +
866 workVarCount*sample_count + root->offset);
867 for (i = 0; i < count; i++)
868 sample_idx_dst[i] = (unsigned short)sample_idx_src[sidx[i]];
869 }
870 else
871 {
872 int* sample_idx_dst = buf->data.i + root->buf_idx*get_length_subbuf() +
873 workVarCount*sample_count + root->offset;
874 for (i = 0; i < count; i++)
875 sample_idx_dst[i] = sample_idx_src[sidx[i]];
876 }
877 }
878
879 __END__;
880
881 cvReleaseMat( &isubsample_idx );
882 cvReleaseMat( &subsample_co );
883
884 return root;
885}
886
887
888void CvDTreeTrainData::get_vectors( const CvMat* _subsample_idx,
889 float* values, uchar* missing,
890 float* _responses, bool get_class_idx )
891{
892 CvMat* subsample_idx = 0;
893 CvMat* subsample_co = 0;
894
895 CV_FUNCNAME( "CvDTreeTrainData::get_vectors" );
896
897 __BEGIN__;
898
899 int i, vi, total = sample_count, count = total, cur_ofs = 0;
900 int* sidx = 0;
901 int* co = 0;
902
903 cv::AutoBuffer<uchar> inn_buf(sample_count*(2*sizeof(int) + sizeof(float)));
904 if( _subsample_idx )
905 {
906 CV_CALL( subsample_idx = cvPreprocessIndexArray( _subsample_idx, sample_count ));
907 sidx = subsample_idx->data.i;
908 CV_CALL( subsample_co = cvCreateMat( 1, sample_count*2, CV_32SC1 ));
909 co = subsample_co->data.i;
910 cvZero( subsample_co );
911 count = subsample_idx->cols + subsample_idx->rows - 1;
912 for( i = 0; i < count; i++ )
913 co[sidx[i]*2]++;
914 for( i = 0; i < total; i++ )
915 {
916 int count_i = co[i*2];
917 if( count_i )
918 {
919 co[i*2+1] = cur_ofs*var_count;
920 cur_ofs += count_i;
921 }
922 }
923 }
924
925 if( missing )
926 memset( missing, 1, count*var_count );
927
928 for( vi = 0; vi < var_count; vi++ )
929 {
930 int ci = get_var_type(vi);
931 if( ci >= 0 ) // categorical
932 {
933 float* dst = values + vi;
934 uchar* m = missing ? missing + vi : 0;
935 const int* src = get_cat_var_data(data_root, vi, (int*)(uchar*)inn_buf);
936
937 for( i = 0; i < count; i++, dst += var_count )
938 {
939 int idx = sidx ? sidx[i] : i;
940 int val = src[idx];
941 *dst = (float)val;
942 if( m )
943 {
944 *m = (!is_buf_16u && val < 0) || (is_buf_16u && (val == 65535));
945 m += var_count;
946 }
947 }
948 }
949 else // ordered
950 {
951 float* dst = values + vi;
952 uchar* m = missing ? missing + vi : 0;
953 int count1 = data_root->get_num_valid(vi);
954 float *src_val_buf = (float*)(uchar*)inn_buf;
955 int* src_idx_buf = (int*)(src_val_buf + sample_count);
956 int* sample_indices_buf = src_idx_buf + sample_count;
957 const float *src_val = 0;
958 const int* src_idx = 0;
959 get_ord_var_data(data_root, vi, src_val_buf, src_idx_buf, &src_val, &src_idx, sample_indices_buf);
960
961 for( i = 0; i < count1; i++ )
962 {
963 int idx = src_idx[i];
964 int count_i = 1;
965 if( co )
966 {
967 count_i = co[idx*2];
968 cur_ofs = co[idx*2+1];
969 }
970 else
971 cur_ofs = idx*var_count;
972 if( count_i )
973 {
974 float val = src_val[i];
975 for( ; count_i > 0; count_i--, cur_ofs += var_count )
976 {
977 dst[cur_ofs] = val;
978 if( m )
979 m[cur_ofs] = 0;
980 }
981 }
982 }
983 }
984 }
985
986 // copy responses
987 if( _responses )
988 {
989 if( is_classifier )
990 {
991 const int* src = get_class_labels(data_root, (int*)(uchar*)inn_buf);
992 for( i = 0; i < count; i++ )
993 {
994 int idx = sidx ? sidx[i] : i;
995 int val = get_class_idx ? src[idx] :
996 cat_map->data.i[cat_ofs->data.i[cat_var_count]+src[idx]];
997 _responses[i] = (float)val;
998 }
999 }
1000 else
1001 {
1002 float* val_buf = (float*)(uchar*)inn_buf;
1003 int* sample_idx_buf = (int*)(val_buf + sample_count);
1004 const float* _values = get_ord_responses(data_root, val_buf, sample_idx_buf);
1005 for( i = 0; i < count; i++ )
1006 {
1007 int idx = sidx ? sidx[i] : i;
1008 _responses[i] = _values[idx];
1009 }
1010 }
1011 }
1012
1013 __END__;
1014
1015 cvReleaseMat( &subsample_idx );
1016 cvReleaseMat( &subsample_co );
1017}
1018
1019
1020CvDTreeNode* CvDTreeTrainData::new_node( CvDTreeNode* parent, int count,
1021 int storage_idx, int offset )
1022{
1023 CvDTreeNode* node = (CvDTreeNode*)cvSetNew( node_heap );
1024
1025 node->sample_count = count;
1026 node->depth = parent ? parent->depth + 1 : 0;
1027 node->parent = parent;
1028 node->left = node->right = 0;
1029 node->split = 0;
1030 node->value = 0;
1031 node->class_idx = 0;
1032 node->maxlr = 0.;
1033
1034 node->buf_idx = storage_idx;
1035 node->offset = offset;
1036 if( nv_heap )
1037 node->num_valid = (int*)cvSetNew( nv_heap );
1038 else
1039 node->num_valid = 0;
1040 node->alpha = node->node_risk = node->tree_risk = node->tree_error = 0.;
1041 node->complexity = 0;
1042
1043 if( params.cv_folds > 0 && cv_heap )
1044 {
1045 int cv_n = params.cv_folds;
1046 node->Tn = INT_MAX;
1047 node->cv_Tn = (int*)cvSetNew( cv_heap );
1048 node->cv_node_risk = (double*)cvAlignPtr(node->cv_Tn + cv_n, sizeof(double));
1049 node->cv_node_error = node->cv_node_risk + cv_n;
1050 }
1051 else
1052 {
1053 node->Tn = 0;
1054 node->cv_Tn = 0;
1055 node->cv_node_risk = 0;
1056 node->cv_node_error = 0;
1057 }
1058
1059 return node;
1060}
1061
1062
1063CvDTreeSplit* CvDTreeTrainData::new_split_ord( int vi, float cmp_val,
1064 int split_point, int inversed, float quality )
1065{
1066 CvDTreeSplit* split = (CvDTreeSplit*)cvSetNew( split_heap );
1067 split->var_idx = vi;
1068 split->condensed_idx = INT_MIN;
1069 split->ord.c = cmp_val;
1070 split->ord.split_point = split_point;
1071 split->inversed = inversed;
1072 split->quality = quality;
1073 split->next = 0;
1074
1075 return split;
1076}
1077
1078
1079CvDTreeSplit* CvDTreeTrainData::new_split_cat( int vi, float quality )
1080{
1081 CvDTreeSplit* split = (CvDTreeSplit*)cvSetNew( split_heap );
1082 int i, n = (max_c_count + 31)/32;
1083
1084 split->var_idx = vi;
1085 split->condensed_idx = INT_MIN;
1086 split->inversed = 0;
1087 split->quality = quality;
1088 for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
1089 split->subset[i] = 0;
1090 split->next = 0;
1091
1092 return split;
1093}
1094
1095
1096void CvDTreeTrainData::free_node( CvDTreeNode* node )
1097{
1098 CvDTreeSplit* split = node->split;
1099 free_node_data( node );
1100 while( split )
1101 {
1102 CvDTreeSplit* next = split->next;
1103 cvSetRemoveByPtr( split_heap, split );
1104 split = next;
1105 }
1106 node->split = 0;
1107 cvSetRemoveByPtr( node_heap, node );
1108}
1109
1110
1111void CvDTreeTrainData::free_node_data( CvDTreeNode* node )
1112{
1113 if( node->num_valid )
1114 {
1115 cvSetRemoveByPtr( nv_heap, node->num_valid );
1116 node->num_valid = 0;
1117 }
1118 // do not free cv_* fields, as all the cross-validation related data is released at once.
1119}

1122void CvDTreeTrainData::free_train_data()
1123{
1124 cvReleaseMat( &counts );
1125 cvReleaseMat( &buf );
1126 cvReleaseMat( &direction );
1127 cvReleaseMat( &split_buf );
1128 cvReleaseMemStorage( &temp_storage );
1129 cvReleaseMat( &responses_copy );
1130 cv_heap = nv_heap = 0;
1131}

1133
1134void CvDTreeTrainData::clear()
1135{
1136 free_train_data();
1137
1138 cvReleaseMemStorage( &tree_storage );
1139
1140 cvReleaseMat( &var_idx );
1141 cvReleaseMat( &var_type );
1142 cvReleaseMat( &cat_count );
1143 cvReleaseMat( &cat_ofs );
1144 cvReleaseMat( &cat_map );
1145 cvReleaseMat( &priors );
1146 cvReleaseMat( &priors_mult );
1147
1148 node_heap = split_heap = 0;
1149
1150 sample_count = var_all = var_count = max_c_count = ord_var_count = cat_var_count = 0;
1151 have_labels = have_priors = is_classifier = false;
1152
1153 buf_count = buf_size = 0;
1154 shared = false;
1155
1156 data_root = 0;
1157
1158 rng = &cv::theRNG();
1159}

1162int CvDTreeTrainData::get_num_classes() const
1163{
1164 return is_classifier ? cat_count->data.i[cat_var_count] : 0;
1165}

1167
1168int CvDTreeTrainData::get_var_type(int vi) const
1169{
1170 return var_type->data.i[vi];
1171}
1172
1173void CvDTreeTrainData::get_ord_var_data( CvDTreeNode* n, int vi, float* ord_values_buf, int* sorted_indices_buf,
1174 const float** ord_values, const int** sorted_indices, int* sample_indices_buf )
1175{
1176 int vidx = var_idx ? var_idx->data.i[vi] : vi;
1177 int node_sample_count = n->sample_count;
1178 int td_step = train_data->step/CV_ELEM_SIZE(train_data->type);
1179
1180 const int* sample_indices = get_sample_indices(n, sample_indices_buf);
1181
1182 if( !is_buf_16u )
1183 *sorted_indices = buf->data.i + n->buf_idx*get_length_subbuf() +
1184 vi*sample_count + n->offset;
1185 else {
1186 const unsigned short* short_indices = (const unsigned short*)(buf->data.s + n->buf_idx*get_length_subbuf() +
1187 vi*sample_count + n->offset );
1188 for( int i = 0; i < node_sample_count; i++ )
1189 sorted_indices_buf[i] = short_indices[i];
1190 *sorted_indices = sorted_indices_buf;
1191 }
1192
1193 if( tflag == CV_ROW_SAMPLE )
1194 {
1195 for( int i = 0; i < node_sample_count &&
1196 ((((*sorted_indices)[i] >= 0) && !is_buf_16u) || (((*sorted_indices)[i] != 65535) && is_buf_16u)); i++ )
1197 {
1198 int idx = (*sorted_indices)[i];
1199 idx = sample_indices[idx];
1200 ord_values_buf[i] = *(train_data->data.fl + idx * td_step + vidx);
1201 }
1202 }
1203 else
1204 for( int i = 0; i < node_sample_count &&
1205 ((((*sorted_indices)[i] >= 0) && !is_buf_16u) || (((*sorted_indices)[i] != 65535) && is_buf_16u)); i++ )
1206 {
1207 int idx = (*sorted_indices)[i];
1208 idx = sample_indices[idx];
1209 ord_values_buf[i] = *(train_data->data.fl + vidx* td_step + idx);
1210 }
1211
1212 *ord_values = ord_values_buf;
1213}
1214
1215
1216const int* CvDTreeTrainData::get_class_labels( CvDTreeNode* n, int* labels_buf )
1217{
1218 if (is_classifier)
1219 return get_cat_var_data( n, var_count, labels_buf);
1220 return 0;
1221}
1222
1223const int* CvDTreeTrainData::get_sample_indices( CvDTreeNode* n, int* indices_buf )
1224{
1225 return get_cat_var_data( n, get_work_var_count(), indices_buf );
1226}
1227
1228const float* CvDTreeTrainData::get_ord_responses( CvDTreeNode* n, float* values_buf, int*sample_indices_buf )
1229{
1230 int _sample_count = n->sample_count;
1231 int r_step = CV_IS_MAT_CONT(responses->type) ? 1 : responses->step/CV_ELEM_SIZE(responses->type);
1232 const int* indices = get_sample_indices(n, sample_indices_buf);
1233
1234 for( int i = 0; i < _sample_count &&
1235 (((indices[i] >= 0) && !is_buf_16u) || ((indices[i] != 65535) && is_buf_16u)); i++ )
1236 {
1237 int idx = indices[i];
1238 values_buf[i] = *(responses->data.fl + idx * r_step);
1239 }
1240
1241 return values_buf;
1242}
1243
1244
1245const int* CvDTreeTrainData::get_cv_labels( CvDTreeNode* n, int* labels_buf )
1246{
1247 if (have_labels)
1248 return get_cat_var_data( n, get_work_var_count()- 1, labels_buf);
1249 return 0;
1250}

1252
1253const int* CvDTreeTrainData::get_cat_var_data( CvDTreeNode* n, int vi, int* cat_values_buf)
1254{
1255 const int* cat_values = 0;
1256 if( !is_buf_16u )
1257 cat_values = buf->data.i + n->buf_idx*get_length_subbuf() +
1258 vi*sample_count + n->offset;
1259 else {
1260 const unsigned short* short_values = (const unsigned short*)(buf->data.s + n->buf_idx*get_length_subbuf() +
1261 vi*sample_count + n->offset);
1262 for( int i = 0; i < n->sample_count; i++ )
1263 cat_values_buf[i] = short_values[i];
1264 cat_values = cat_values_buf;
1265 }
1266 return cat_values;
1267}

1269
1270int CvDTreeTrainData::get_child_buf_idx( CvDTreeNode* n )
1271{
1272 int idx = n->buf_idx + 1;
1273 if( idx >= buf_count )
1274 idx = shared ? 1 : 0;
1275 return idx;
1276}
1277
1278
1279void CvDTreeTrainData::write_params( CvFileStorage* fs ) const
1280{
1281 CV_FUNCNAME( "CvDTreeTrainData::write_params" );
1282
1283 __BEGIN__;
1284
1285 int vi, vcount = var_count;
1286
1287 cvWriteInt( fs, "is_classifier", is_classifier ? 1 : 0 );
1288 cvWriteInt( fs, "var_all", var_all );
1289 cvWriteInt( fs, "var_count", var_count );
1290 cvWriteInt( fs, "ord_var_count", ord_var_count );
1291 cvWriteInt( fs, "cat_var_count", cat_var_count );
1292
1293 cvStartWriteStruct( fs, "training_params", CV_NODE_MAP );
1294 cvWriteInt( fs, "use_surrogates", params.use_surrogates ? 1 : 0 );
1295
1296 if( is_classifier )
1297 {
1298 cvWriteInt( fs, "max_categories", params.max_categories );
1299 }
1300 else
1301 {
1302 cvWriteReal( fs, "regression_accuracy", params.regression_accuracy );
1303 }
1304
1305 cvWriteInt( fs, "max_depth", params.max_depth );
1306 cvWriteInt( fs, "min_sample_count", params.min_sample_count );
1307 cvWriteInt( fs, "cross_validation_folds", params.cv_folds );
1308
1309 if( params.cv_folds > 1 )
1310 {
1311 cvWriteInt( fs, "use_1se_rule", params.use_1se_rule ? 1 : 0 );
1312 cvWriteInt( fs, "truncate_pruned_tree", params.truncate_pruned_tree ? 1 : 0 );
1313 }
1314
1315 if( priors )
1316 cvWrite( fs, "priors", priors );
1317
1318 cvEndWriteStruct( fs );
1319
1320 if( var_idx )
1321 cvWrite( fs, "var_idx", var_idx );
1322
1323 cvStartWriteStruct( fs, "var_type", CV_NODE_SEQ+CV_NODE_FLOW );
1324
1325 for( vi = 0; vi < vcount; vi++ )
1326 cvWriteInt( fs, 0, var_type->data.i[vi] >= 0 );
1327
1328 cvEndWriteStruct( fs );
1329
1330 if( cat_count && (cat_var_count > 0 || is_classifier) )
1331 {
1332 CV_ASSERT( cat_count != 0 );
1333 cvWrite( fs, "cat_count", cat_count );
1334 cvWrite( fs, "cat_map", cat_map );
1335 }
1336
1337 __END__;
1338}
1339
1340
1341void CvDTreeTrainData::read_params( CvFileStorage* fs, CvFileNode* node )
1342{
1343 CV_FUNCNAME( "CvDTreeTrainData::read_params" );
1344
1345 __BEGIN__;
1346
1347 CvFileNode *tparams_node, *vartype_node;
1348 CvSeqReader reader;
1349 int vi, max_split_size, tree_block_size;
1350
1351 is_classifier = (cvReadIntByName( fs, node, "is_classifier" ) != 0);
1352 var_all = cvReadIntByName( fs, node, "var_all" );
1353 var_count = cvReadIntByName( fs, node, "var_count", var_all );
1354 cat_var_count = cvReadIntByName( fs, node, "cat_var_count" );
1355 ord_var_count = cvReadIntByName( fs, node, "ord_var_count" );
1356
1357 tparams_node = cvGetFileNodeByName( fs, node, "training_params" );
1358
1359 if( tparams_node ) // training parameters are not necessary
1360 {
1361 params.use_surrogates = cvReadIntByName( fs, tparams_node, "use_surrogates", 1 ) != 0;
1362
1363 if( is_classifier )
1364 {
1365 params.max_categories = cvReadIntByName( fs, tparams_node, "max_categories" );
1366 }
1367 else
1368 {
1369 params.regression_accuracy =
1370 (float)cvReadRealByName( fs, tparams_node, "regression_accuracy" );
1371 }
1372
1373 params.max_depth = cvReadIntByName( fs, tparams_node, "max_depth" );
1374 params.min_sample_count = cvReadIntByName( fs, tparams_node, "min_sample_count" );
1375 params.cv_folds = cvReadIntByName( fs, tparams_node, "cross_validation_folds" );
1376
1377 if( params.cv_folds > 1 )
1378 {
1379 params.use_1se_rule = cvReadIntByName( fs, tparams_node, "use_1se_rule" ) != 0;
1380 params.truncate_pruned_tree =
1381 cvReadIntByName( fs, tparams_node, "truncate_pruned_tree" ) != 0;
1382 }
1383
1384 priors = (CvMat*)cvReadByName( fs, tparams_node, "priors" );
1385 if( priors )
1386 {
1387 if( !CV_IS_MAT(priors) )
1388 CV_ERROR( CV_StsParseError, "priors must stored as a matrix" );
1389 priors_mult = cvCloneMat( priors );
1390 }
1391 }
1392
1393 CV_CALL( var_idx = (CvMat*)cvReadByName( fs, node, "var_idx" ));
1394 if( var_idx )
1395 {
1396 if( !CV_IS_MAT(var_idx) ||
1397 (var_idx->cols != 1 && var_idx->rows != 1) ||
1398 var_idx->cols + var_idx->rows - 1 != var_count ||
1399 CV_MAT_TYPE(var_idx->type) != CV_32SC1 )
1400 CV_ERROR( CV_StsParseError,
1401 "var_idx (if exist) must be valid 1d integer vector containing <var_count> elements" );
1402
1403 for( vi = 0; vi < var_count; vi++ )
1404 if( (unsigned)var_idx->data.i[vi] >= (unsigned)var_all )
1405 CV_ERROR( CV_StsOutOfRange, "some of var_idx elements are out of range" );
1406 }
1407
1408 ////// read var type
1409 CV_CALL( var_type = cvCreateMat( 1, var_count + 2, CV_32SC1 ));
1410
1411 cat_var_count = 0;
1412 ord_var_count = -1;
1413 vartype_node = cvGetFileNodeByName( fs, node, "var_type" );
1414
1415 if( vartype_node && CV_NODE_TYPE(vartype_node->tag) == CV_NODE_INT && var_count == 1 )
1416 var_type->data.i[0] = vartype_node->data.i ? cat_var_count++ : ord_var_count--;
1417 else
1418 {
1419 if( !vartype_node || CV_NODE_TYPE(vartype_node->tag) != CV_NODE_SEQ ||
1420 vartype_node->data.seq->total != var_count )
1421 CV_ERROR( CV_StsParseError, "var_type must exist and be a sequence of 0's and 1's" );
1422
1423 cvStartReadSeq( vartype_node->data.seq, &reader );
1424
1425 for( vi = 0; vi < var_count; vi++ )
1426 {
1427 CvFileNode* n = (CvFileNode*)reader.ptr;
1428 if( CV_NODE_TYPE(n->tag) != CV_NODE_INT || (n->data.i & ~1) )
1429 CV_ERROR( CV_StsParseError, "var_type must exist and be a sequence of 0's and 1's" );
1430 var_type->data.i[vi] = n->data.i ? cat_var_count++ : ord_var_count--;
1431 CV_NEXT_SEQ_ELEM( reader.seq->elem_size, reader );
1432 }
1433 }
1434 var_type->data.i[var_count] = cat_var_count;
1435
1436 ord_var_count = ~ord_var_count;
1437 //////
1438
1439 if( cat_var_count > 0 || is_classifier )
1440 {
1441 int ccount, total_c_count = 0;
1442 CV_CALL( cat_count = (CvMat*)cvReadByName( fs, node, "cat_count" ));
1443 CV_CALL( cat_map = (CvMat*)cvReadByName( fs, node, "cat_map" ));
1444
1445 if( !CV_IS_MAT(cat_count) || !CV_IS_MAT(cat_map) ||
1446 (cat_count->cols != 1 && cat_count->rows != 1) ||
1447 CV_MAT_TYPE(cat_count->type) != CV_32SC1 ||
1448 cat_count->cols + cat_count->rows - 1 != cat_var_count + is_classifier ||
1449 (cat_map->cols != 1 && cat_map->rows != 1) ||
1450 CV_MAT_TYPE(cat_map->type) != CV_32SC1 )
1451 CV_ERROR( CV_StsParseError,
1452 "Both cat_count and cat_map must exist and be valid 1d integer vectors of an appropriate size" );
1453
1454 ccount = cat_var_count + is_classifier;
1455
1456 CV_CALL( cat_ofs = cvCreateMat( 1, ccount + 1, CV_32SC1 ));
1457 cat_ofs->data.i[0] = 0;
1458 max_c_count = 1;
1459
1460 for( vi = 0; vi < ccount; vi++ )
1461 {
1462 int val = cat_count->data.i[vi];
1463 if( val <= 0 )
1464 CV_ERROR( CV_StsOutOfRange, "some of cat_count elements are out of range" );
1465 max_c_count = MAX( max_c_count, val );
1466 cat_ofs->data.i[vi+1] = total_c_count += val;
1467 }
1468
1469 if( cat_map->cols + cat_map->rows - 1 != total_c_count )
1470 CV_ERROR( CV_StsBadSize,
1471 "cat_map vector length is not equal to the total number of categories in all categorical vars" );
1472 }
1473
1474 max_split_size = cvAlign(sizeof(CvDTreeSplit) +
1475 (MAX(0,max_c_count - 33)/32)*sizeof(int),sizeof(void*));
1476
1477 tree_block_size = MAX((int)sizeof(CvDTreeNode)*8, max_split_size);
1478 tree_block_size = MAX(tree_block_size + block_size_delta, min_block_size);
1479 CV_CALL( tree_storage = cvCreateMemStorage( tree_block_size ));
1480 CV_CALL( node_heap = cvCreateSet( 0, sizeof(node_heap[0]),
1481 sizeof(CvDTreeNode), tree_storage ));
1482 CV_CALL( split_heap = cvCreateSet( 0, sizeof(split_heap[0]),
1483 max_split_size, tree_storage ));
1484
1485 __END__;
1486}

1614bool CvDTree::train( CvDTreeTrainData* _data, const CvMat* _subsample_idx )
1615{
1616 bool result = false;
1617
1618 CV_FUNCNAME( "CvDTree::train" );
1619
1620 __BEGIN__;
1621
1622 clear();
1623 data = _data;
1624 data->shared = true;
1625 CV_CALL( result = do_train(_subsample_idx));
1626
1627 __END__;
1628
1629 return result;
1630}
1631
1632
1633bool CvDTree::do_train( const CvMat* _subsample_idx )
1634{
1635 bool result = false;
1636
1637 CV_FUNCNAME( "CvDTree::do_train" );
1638
1639 __BEGIN__;
1640
1641 root = data->subsample_data( _subsample_idx );
1642
1643 CV_CALL( try_split_node(root));
1644
1645 if( root->split )
1646 {
1647 CV_Assert( root->left );
1648 CV_Assert( root->right );
1649
1650 if( data->params.cv_folds > 0 )
1651 CV_CALL( prune_cv() );
1652
1653 if( !data->shared )
1654 data->free_train_data();
1655
1656 result = true;
1657 }
1658
1659 __END__;
1660
1661 return result;
1662}
1663
1664
1665void CvDTree::try_split_node( CvDTreeNode* node )
1666{
1667 CvDTreeSplit* best_split = 0;
1668 int i, n = node->sample_count, vi;
1669 bool can_split = true;
1670 double quality_scale;
1671
1672 calc_node_value( node );
1673
1674 if( node->sample_count <= data->params.min_sample_count ||
1675 node->depth >= data->params.max_depth )
1676 can_split = false;
1677
1678 if( can_split && data->is_classifier )
1679 {
1680 // check if we have a "pure" node,
1681 // we assume that cls_count is filled by calc_node_value()
1682 int* cls_count = data->counts->data.i;
1683 int nz = 0, m = data->get_num_classes();
1684 for( i = 0; i < m; i++ )
1685 nz += cls_count[i] != 0;
1686 if( nz == 1 ) // there is only one class
1687 can_split = false;
1688 }
1689 else if( can_split )
1690 {
1691 if( sqrt(node->node_risk)/n < data->params.regression_accuracy )
1692 can_split = false;
1693 }
1694
1695 if( can_split )
1696 {
1697 best_split = find_best_split(node);
1698 // TODO: check the split quality ...
1699 node->split = best_split;
1700 }
1701 if( !can_split || !best_split )
1702 {
1703 data->free_node_data(node);
1704 return;
1705 }
1706
1707 quality_scale = calc_node_dir( node );
1708 if( data->params.use_surrogates )
1709 {
1710 // find all the surrogate splits
1711 // and sort them by their similarity to the primary one
1712 for( vi = 0; vi < data->var_count; vi++ )
1713 {
1714 CvDTreeSplit* split;
1715 int ci = data->get_var_type(vi);
1716
1717 if( vi == best_split->var_idx )
1718 continue;
1719
1720 if( ci >= 0 )
1721 split = find_surrogate_split_cat( node, vi );
1722 else
1723 split = find_surrogate_split_ord( node, vi );
1724
1725 if( split )
1726 {
1727 // insert the split
1728 CvDTreeSplit* prev_split = node->split;
1729 split->quality = (float)(split->quality*quality_scale);
1730
1731 while( prev_split->next &&
1732 prev_split->next->quality > split->quality )
1733 prev_split = prev_split->next;
1734 split->next = prev_split->next;
1735 prev_split->next = split;
1736 }
1737 }
1738 }
1739 split_node_data( node );
1740 try_split_node( node->left );
1741 try_split_node( node->right );
1742}
1743
1744
1745// calculate direction (left(-1),right(1),missing(0))
1746// for each sample using the best split
1747// the function returns scale coefficients for surrogate split quality factors.
1748// the scale is applied to normalize surrogate split quality relatively to the
1749// best (primary) split quality. That is, if a surrogate split is absolutely
1750// identical to the primary split, its quality will be set to the maximum value =
1751// quality of the primary split; otherwise, it will be lower.
1752// besides, the function compute node->maxlr,
1753// minimum possible quality (w/o considering the above mentioned scale)
1754// for a surrogate split. Surrogate splits with quality less than node->maxlr
1755// are not discarded.
1756double CvDTree::calc_node_dir( CvDTreeNode* node )
1757{
1758 char* dir = (char*)data->direction->data.ptr;
1759 int i, n = node->sample_count, vi = node->split->var_idx;
1760 double L, R;
1761
1762 assert( !node->split->inversed );
1763
1764 if( data->get_var_type(vi) >= 0 ) // split on categorical var
1765 {
1766 cv::AutoBuffer<int> inn_buf(n*(!data->have_priors ? 1 : 2));
1767 int* labels_buf = (int*)inn_buf;
1768 const int* labels = data->get_cat_var_data( node, vi, labels_buf );
1769 const int* subset = node->split->subset;
1770 if( !data->have_priors )
1771 {
1772 int sum = 0, sum_abs = 0;
1773
1774 for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
1775 {
1776 int idx = labels[i];
1777 int d = ( ((idx >= 0)&&(!data->is_buf_16u)) || ((idx != 65535)&&(data->is_buf_16u)) ) ?
1778 CV_DTREE_CAT_DIR(idx,subset) : 0;
1779 sum += d; sum_abs += d & 1;
1780 dir[i] = (char)d;
1781 }
1782
1783 R = (sum_abs + sum) >> 1;
1784 L = (sum_abs - sum) >> 1;
1785 }
1786 else
1787 {
1788 const double* priors = data->priors_mult->data.db;
1789 double sum = 0, sum_abs = 0;
1790 int* responses_buf = labels_buf + n;
1791 const int* responses = data->get_class_labels(node, responses_buf);
1792
1793 for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
1794 {
1795 int idx = labels[i];
1796 double w = priors[responses[i]];
1797 int d = idx >= 0 ? CV_DTREE_CAT_DIR(idx,subset) : 0;
1798 sum += d*w; sum_abs += (d & 1)*w;
1799 dir[i] = (char)d;
1800 }
1801
1802 R = (sum_abs + sum) * 0.5;
1803 L = (sum_abs - sum) * 0.5;
1804 }
1805 }
1806 else // split on ordered var
1807 {
1808 int split_point = node->split->ord.split_point;
1809 int n1 = node->get_num_valid(vi);
1810 cv::AutoBuffer<uchar> inn_buf(n*(sizeof(int)*(data->have_priors ? 3 : 2) + sizeof(float)));
1811 float* val_buf = (float*)(uchar*)inn_buf;
1812 int* sorted_buf = (int*)(val_buf + n);
1813 int* sample_idx_buf = sorted_buf + n;
1814 const float* val = 0;
1815 const int* sorted = 0;
1816 data->get_ord_var_data( node, vi, val_buf, sorted_buf, &val, &sorted, sample_idx_buf);
1817
1818 assert( 0 <= split_point && split_point < n1-1 );
1819
1820 if( !data->have_priors )
1821 {
1822 for( i = 0; i <= split_point; i++ )
1823 dir[sorted[i]] = (char)-1;
1824 for( ; i < n1; i++ )
1825 dir[sorted[i]] = (char)1;
1826 for( ; i < n; i++ )
1827 dir[sorted[i]] = (char)0;
1828
1829 L = split_point-1;
1830 R = n1 - split_point + 1;
1831 }
1832 else
1833 {
1834 const double* priors = data->priors_mult->data.db;
1835 int* responses_buf = sample_idx_buf + n;
1836 const int* responses = data->get_class_labels(node, responses_buf);
1837 L = R = 0;
1838
1839 for( i = 0; i <= split_point; i++ )
1840 {
1841 int idx = sorted[i];
1842 double w = priors[responses[idx]];
1843 dir[idx] = (char)-1;
1844 L += w;
1845 }
1846
1847 for( ; i < n1; i++ )
1848 {
1849 int idx = sorted[i];
1850 double w = priors[responses[idx]];
1851 dir[idx] = (char)1;
1852 R += w;
1853 }
1854
1855 for( ; i < n; i++ )
1856 dir[sorted[i]] = (char)0;
1857 }
1858 }
1859 node->maxlr = MAX( L, R );
1860 return node->split->quality/(L + R);
1861}
