1867template<> CV_EXPORTS void Ptr<CvDTreeSplit>::delete_obj()
1868{
1869 fastFree(obj);
1870}
1871
1872DTreeBestSplitFinder::DTreeBestSplitFinder( CvDTree* _tree, CvDTreeNode* _node)
1873{
1874 tree = _tree;
1875 node = _node;
1876 splitSize = tree->get_data()->split_heap->elem_size;
1877
1878 bestSplit = (CvDTreeSplit*)fastMalloc(splitSize);
1879 memset((CvDTreeSplit*)bestSplit, 0, splitSize);
1880 bestSplit->quality = -1;
1881 bestSplit->condensed_idx = INT_MIN;
1882 split = (CvDTreeSplit*)fastMalloc(splitSize);
1883 memset((CvDTreeSplit*)split, 0, splitSize);
1884 //haveSplit = false;
1885}
1886
1887DTreeBestSplitFinder::DTreeBestSplitFinder( const DTreeBestSplitFinder& finder, Split )
1888{
1889 tree = finder.tree;
1890 node = finder.node;
1891 splitSize = tree->get_data()->split_heap->elem_size;
1892
1893 bestSplit = (CvDTreeSplit*)fastMalloc(splitSize);
1894 memcpy((CvDTreeSplit*)(bestSplit), (const CvDTreeSplit*)finder.bestSplit, splitSize);
1895 split = (CvDTreeSplit*)fastMalloc(splitSize);
1896 memset((CvDTreeSplit*)split, 0, splitSize);
1897}
1898
1899void DTreeBestSplitFinder::operator()(const BlockedRange& range)
1900{
1901 int vi, vi1 = range.begin(), vi2 = range.end();
1902 int n = node->sample_count;
1903 CvDTreeTrainData* data = tree->get_data();
1904 AutoBuffer<uchar> inn_buf(2*n*(sizeof(int) + sizeof(float)));
1905
1906 for( vi = vi1; vi < vi2; vi++ )
1907 {
1908 CvDTreeSplit *res;
1909 int ci = data->get_var_type(vi);
1910 if( node->get_num_valid(vi) <= 1 )
1911 continue;
1912
1913 if( data->is_classifier )
1914 {
1915 if( ci >= 0 )
1916 res = tree->find_split_cat_class( node, vi, bestSplit->quality, split, (uchar*)inn_buf );
1917 else
1918 res = tree->find_split_ord_class( node, vi, bestSplit->quality, split, (uchar*)inn_buf );
1919 }
1920 else
1921 {
1922 if( ci >= 0 )
1923 res = tree->find_split_cat_reg( node, vi, bestSplit->quality, split, (uchar*)inn_buf );
1924 else
1925 res = tree->find_split_ord_reg( node, vi, bestSplit->quality, split, (uchar*)inn_buf );
1926 }
1927
1928 if( res && bestSplit->quality < split->quality )
1929 memcpy( (CvDTreeSplit*)bestSplit, (CvDTreeSplit*)split, splitSize );
1930 }
1931}
1932
1933void DTreeBestSplitFinder::join( DTreeBestSplitFinder& rhs )
1934{
1935 if( bestSplit->quality < rhs.bestSplit->quality )
1936 memcpy( (CvDTreeSplit*)bestSplit, (CvDTreeSplit*)rhs.bestSplit, splitSize );
1937}
1938}
1939
1940
1941CvDTreeSplit* CvDTree::find_best_split( CvDTreeNode* node )
1942{
1943 DTreeBestSplitFinder finder( this, node );
1944
1945 cv::parallel_reduce(cv::BlockedRange(0, data->var_count), finder);
1946
1947 CvDTreeSplit *bestSplit = 0;
1948 if( finder.bestSplit->quality > 0 )
1949 {
1950 bestSplit = data->new_split_cat( 0, -1.0f );
1951 memcpy( bestSplit, finder.bestSplit, finder.splitSize );
1952 }
1953
1954 return bestSplit;
1955}
1956
1957CvDTreeSplit* CvDTree::find_split_ord_class( CvDTreeNode* node, int vi,
1958 float init_quality, CvDTreeSplit* _split, uchar* _ext_buf )
1959{
1960 const float epsilon = FLT_EPSILON*2;
1961 int n = node->sample_count;
1962 int n1 = node->get_num_valid(vi);
1963 int m = data->get_num_classes();
1964
1965 int base_size = 2*m*sizeof(int);
1966 cv::AutoBuffer<uchar> inn_buf(base_size);
1967 if( !_ext_buf )
1968 inn_buf.allocate(base_size + n*(3*sizeof(int)+sizeof(float)));
1969 uchar* base_buf = (uchar*)inn_buf;
1970 uchar* ext_buf = _ext_buf ? _ext_buf : base_buf + base_size;
1971 float* values_buf = (float*)ext_buf;
1972 int* sorted_indices_buf = (int*)(values_buf + n);
1973 int* sample_indices_buf = sorted_indices_buf + n;
1974 const float* values = 0;
1975 const int* sorted_indices = 0;
1976 data->get_ord_var_data( node, vi, values_buf, sorted_indices_buf, &values,
1977 &sorted_indices, sample_indices_buf );
1978 int* responses_buf = sample_indices_buf + n;
1979 const int* responses = data->get_class_labels( node, responses_buf );
1980
1981 const int* rc0 = data->counts->data.i;
1982 int* lc = (int*)base_buf;
1983 int* rc = lc + m;
1984 int i, best_i = -1;
1985 double lsum2 = 0, rsum2 = 0, best_val = init_quality;
1986 const double* priors = data->have_priors ? data->priors_mult->data.db : 0;
1987
1988 // init arrays of class instance counters on both sides of the split
1989 for( i = 0; i < m; i++ )
1990 {
1991 lc[i] = 0;
1992 rc[i] = rc0[i];
1993 }
1994
1995 // compensate for missing values
1996 for( i = n1; i < n; i++ )
1997 {
1998 rc[responses[sorted_indices[i]]]--;
1999 }
2000
2001 if( !priors )
2002 {
2003 int L = 0, R = n1;
2004
2005 for( i = 0; i < m; i++ )
2006 rsum2 += (double)rc[i]*rc[i];
2007
2008 for( i = 0; i < n1 - 1; i++ )
2009 {
2010 int idx = responses[sorted_indices[i]];
2011 int lv, rv;
2012 L++; R--;
2013 lv = lc[idx]; rv = rc[idx];
2014 lsum2 += lv*2 + 1;
2015 rsum2 -= rv*2 - 1;
2016 lc[idx] = lv + 1; rc[idx] = rv - 1;
2017
2018 if( values[i] + epsilon < values[i+1] )
2019 {
2020 double val = (lsum2*R + rsum2*L)/((double)L*R);
2021 if( best_val < val )
2022 {
2023 best_val = val;
2024 best_i = i;
2025 }
2026 }
2027 }
2028 }
2029 else
2030 {
2031 double L = 0, R = 0;
2032 for( i = 0; i < m; i++ )
2033 {
2034 double wv = rc[i]*priors[i];
2035 R += wv;
2036 rsum2 += wv*wv;
2037 }
2038
2039 for( i = 0; i < n1 - 1; i++ )
2040 {
2041 int idx = responses[sorted_indices[i]];
2042 int lv, rv;
2043 double p = priors[idx], p2 = p*p;
2044 L += p; R -= p;
2045 lv = lc[idx]; rv = rc[idx];
2046 lsum2 += p2*(lv*2 + 1);
2047 rsum2 -= p2*(rv*2 - 1);
2048 lc[idx] = lv + 1; rc[idx] = rv - 1;
2049
2050 if( values[i] + epsilon < values[i+1] )
2051 {
2052 double val = (lsum2*R + rsum2*L)/((double)L*R);
2053 if( best_val < val )
2054 {
2055 best_val = val;
2056 best_i = i;
2057 }
2058 }
2059 }
2060 }
2061
2062 CvDTreeSplit* split = 0;
2063 if( best_i >= 0 )
2064 {
2065 split = _split ? _split : data->new_split_ord( 0, 0.0f, 0, 0, 0.0f );
2066 split->var_idx = vi;
2067 split->ord.c = (values[best_i] + values[best_i+1])*0.5f;
2068 split->ord.split_point = best_i;
2069 split->inversed = 0;
2070 split->quality = (float)best_val;
2071 }
2072 return split;
2073}
2074
2075
2076void CvDTree::cluster_categories( const int* vectors, int n, int m,
2077 int* csums, int k, int* labels )
2078{
2079 // TODO: consider adding priors (class weights) and sample weights to the clustering algorithm
2080 int iters = 0, max_iters = 100;
2081 int i, j, idx;
2082 cv::AutoBuffer<double> buf(n + k);
2083 double *v_weights = buf, *c_weights = buf + n;
2084 bool modified = true;
2085 RNG* r = data->rng;
2086
2087 // assign labels randomly
2088 for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
2089 {
2090 int sum = 0;
2091 const int* v = vectors + i*m;
2092 labels[i] = i < k ? i : r->uniform(0, k);
2093
2094 // compute weight of each vector
2095 for( j = 0; j < m; j++ )
2096 sum += v[j];
2097 v_weights[i] = sum ? 1./sum : 0.;
2098 }
2099
2100 for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
2101 {
2102 int i1 = (*r)(n);
2103 int i2 = (*r)(n);
2104 CV_SWAP( labels[i1], labels[i2], j );
2105 }
2106
2107 for( iters = 0; iters <= max_iters; iters++ )
2108 {
2109 // calculate csums
2110 for( i = 0; i < k; i++ )
2111 {
2112 for( j = 0; j < m; j++ )
2113 csums[i*m + j] = 0;
2114 }
2115
2116 for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
2117 {
2118 const int* v = vectors + i*m;
2119 int* s = csums + labels[i]*m;
2120 for( j = 0; j < m; j++ )
2121 s[j] += v[j];
2122 }
2123
2124 // exit the loop here, when we have up-to-date csums
2125 if( iters == max_iters || !modified )
2126 break;
2127
2128 modified = false;
2129
2130 // calculate weight of each cluster
2131 for( i = 0; i < k; i++ )
2132 {
2133 const int* s = csums + i*m;
2134 int sum = 0;
2135 for( j = 0; j < m; j++ )
2136 sum += s[j];
2137 c_weights[i] = sum ? 1./sum : 0;
2138 }
2139
2140 // now for each vector determine the closest cluster
2141 for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
2142 {
2143 const int* v = vectors + i*m;
2144 double alpha = v_weights[i];
2145 double min_dist2 = DBL_MAX;
2146 int min_idx = -1;
2147
2148 for( idx = 0; idx < k; idx++ )
2149 {
2150 const int* s = csums + idx*m;
2151 double dist2 = 0., beta = c_weights[idx];
2152 for( j = 0; j < m; j++ )
2153 {
2154 double t = v[j]*alpha - s[j]*beta;
2155 dist2 += t*t;
2156 }
2157 if( min_dist2 > dist2 )
2158 {
2159 min_dist2 = dist2;
2160 min_idx = idx;
2161 }
2162 }
2163
2164 if( min_idx != labels[i] )
2165 modified = true;
2166 labels[i] = min_idx;
2167 }
2168 }
2169}
2170
2171
2172CvDTreeSplit* CvDTree::find_split_cat_class( CvDTreeNode* node, int vi, float init_quality,
2173 CvDTreeSplit* _split, uchar* _ext_buf )
2174{
2175 int ci = data->get_var_type(vi);
2176 int n = node->sample_count;
2177 int m = data->get_num_classes();
2178 int _mi = data->cat_count->data.i[ci], mi = _mi;
2179
2180 int base_size = m*(3 + mi)*sizeof(int) + (mi+1)*sizeof(double);
2181 if( m > 2 && mi > data->params.max_categories )
2182 base_size += (m*min(data->params.max_categories, n) + mi)*sizeof(int);
2183 else
2184 base_size += mi*sizeof(int*);
2185 cv::AutoBuffer<uchar> inn_buf(base_size);
2186 if( !_ext_buf )
2187 inn_buf.allocate(base_size + 2*n*sizeof(int));
2188 uchar* base_buf = (uchar*)inn_buf;
2189 uchar* ext_buf = _ext_buf ? _ext_buf : base_buf + base_size;
2190
2191 int* lc = (int*)base_buf;
2192 int* rc = lc + m;
2193 int* _cjk = rc + m*2, *cjk = _cjk;
2194 double* c_weights = (double*)alignPtr(cjk + m*mi, sizeof(double));
2195
2196 int* labels_buf = (int*)ext_buf;
2197 const int* labels = data->get_cat_var_data(node, vi, labels_buf);
2198 int* responses_buf = labels_buf + n;
2199 const int* responses = data->get_class_labels(node, responses_buf);
2200
2201 int* cluster_labels = 0;
2202 int** int_ptr = 0;
2203 int i, j, k, idx;
2204 double L = 0, R = 0;
2205 double best_val = init_quality;
2206 int prevcode = 0, best_subset = -1, subset_i, subset_n, subtract = 0;
2207 const double* priors = data->priors_mult->data.db;
2208
2209 // init array of counters:
2210 // c_{jk} - number of samples that have vi-th input variable = j and response = k.
2211 for( j = -1; j < mi; j++ )
2212 for( k = 0; k < m; k++ )
2213 cjk[j*m + k] = 0;
2214
2215 for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
2216 {
2217 j = ( labels[i] == 65535 && data->is_buf_16u) ? -1 : labels[i];
2218 k = responses[i];
2219 cjk[j*m + k]++;
2220 }
2221
2222 if( m > 2 )
2223 {
2224 if( mi > data->params.max_categories )
2225 {
2226 mi = MIN(data->params.max_categories, n);
2227 cjk = (int*)(c_weights + _mi);
2228 cluster_labels = cjk + m*mi;
2229 cluster_categories( _cjk, _mi, m, cjk, mi, cluster_labels );
2230 }
2231 subset_i = 1;
2232 subset_n = 1 << mi;
2233 }
2234 else
2235 {
2236 assert( m == 2 );
2237 int_ptr = (int**)(c_weights + _mi);
2238 for( j = 0; j < mi; j++ )
2239 int_ptr[j] = cjk + j*2 + 1;
2240 icvSortIntPtr( int_ptr, mi, 0 );
2241 subset_i = 0;
2242 subset_n = mi;
2243 }
2244
2245 for( k = 0; k < m; k++ )
2246 {
2247 int sum = 0;
2248 for( j = 0; j < mi; j++ )
2249 sum += cjk[j*m + k];
2250 rc[k] = sum;
2251 lc[k] = 0;
2252 }
2253
2254 for( j = 0; j < mi; j++ )
2255 {
2256 double sum = 0;
2257 for( k = 0; k < m; k++ )
2258 sum += cjk[j*m + k]*priors[k];
2259 c_weights[j] = sum;
2260 R += c_weights[j];
2261 }
2262
2263 for( ; subset_i < subset_n; subset_i++ )
2264 {
2265 double weight;
2266 int* crow;
2267 double lsum2 = 0, rsum2 = 0;
2268
2269 if( m == 2 )
2270 idx = (int)(int_ptr[subset_i] - cjk)/2;
2271 else
2272 {
2273 int graycode = (subset_i>>1)^subset_i;
2274 int diff = graycode ^ prevcode;
2275
2276 // determine index of the changed bit.
2277 Cv32suf u;
2278 idx = diff >= (1 << 16) ? 16 : 0;
2279 u.f = (float)(((diff >> 16) | diff) & 65535);
2280 idx += (u.i >> 23) - 127;
2281 subtract = graycode < prevcode;
2282 prevcode = graycode;
2283 }
2284
2285 crow = cjk + idx*m;
2286 weight = c_weights[idx];
2287 if( weight < FLT_EPSILON )
2288 continue;
2289
2290 if( !subtract )
2291 {
2292 for( k = 0; k < m; k++ )
2293 {
2294 int t = crow[k];
2295 int lval = lc[k] + t;
2296 int rval = rc[k] - t;
2297 double p = priors[k], p2 = p*p;
2298 lsum2 += p2*lval*lval;
2299 rsum2 += p2*rval*rval;
2300 lc[k] = lval; rc[k] = rval;
2301 }
2302 L += weight;
2303 R -= weight;
2304 }
2305 else
2306 {
2307 for( k = 0; k < m; k++ )
2308 {
2309 int t = crow[k];
2310 int lval = lc[k] - t;
2311 int rval = rc[k] + t;
2312 double p = priors[k], p2 = p*p;
2313 lsum2 += p2*lval*lval;
2314 rsum2 += p2*rval*rval;
2315 lc[k] = lval; rc[k] = rval;
2316 }
2317 L -= weight;
2318 R += weight;
2319 }
2320
2321 if( L > FLT_EPSILON && R > FLT_EPSILON )
2322 {
2323 double val = (lsum2*R + rsum2*L)/((double)L*R);
2324 if( best_val < val )
2325 {
2326 best_val = val;
2327 best_subset = subset_i;
2328 }
2329 }
2330 }
2331
2332 CvDTreeSplit* split = 0;
2333 if( best_subset >= 0 )
2334 {
2335 split = _split ? _split : data->new_split_cat( 0, -1.0f );
2336 split->var_idx = vi;
2337 split->quality = (float)best_val;
2338 memset( split->subset, 0, (data->max_c_count + 31)/32 * sizeof(int));
2339 if( m == 2 )
2340 {
2341 for( i = 0; i <= best_subset; i++ )
2342 {
2343 idx = (int)(int_ptr[i] - cjk) >> 1;
2344 split->subset[idx >> 5] |= 1 << (idx & 31);
2345 }
2346 }
2347 else
2348 {
2349 for( i = 0; i < _mi; i++ )
2350 {
2351 idx = cluster_labels ? cluster_labels[i] : i;
2352 if( best_subset & (1 << idx) )
2353 split->subset[i >> 5] |= 1 << (i & 31);
2354 }
2355 }
2356 }
2357 return split;
2358}
2359
2360
2361CvDTreeSplit* CvDTree::find_split_ord_reg( CvDTreeNode* node, int vi, float init_quality, CvDTreeSplit* _split, uchar* _ext_buf )
2362{
2363 const float epsilon = FLT_EPSILON*2;
2364 int n = node->sample_count;
2365 int n1 = node->get_num_valid(vi);
2366
2367 cv::AutoBuffer<uchar> inn_buf;
2368 if( !_ext_buf )
2369 inn_buf.allocate(2*n*(sizeof(int) + sizeof(float)));
2370 uchar* ext_buf = _ext_buf ? _ext_buf : (uchar*)inn_buf;
2371 float* values_buf = (float*)ext_buf;
2372 int* sorted_indices_buf = (int*)(values_buf + n);
2373 int* sample_indices_buf = sorted_indices_buf + n;
2374 const float* values = 0;
2375 const int* sorted_indices = 0;
2376 data->get_ord_var_data( node, vi, values_buf, sorted_indices_buf, &values, &sorted_indices, sample_indices_buf );
2377 float* responses_buf = (float*)(sample_indices_buf + n);
2378 const float* responses = data->get_ord_responses( node, responses_buf, sample_indices_buf );
2379
2380 int i, best_i = -1;
2381 double best_val = init_quality, lsum = 0, rsum = node->value*n;
2382 int L = 0, R = n1;
2383
2384 // compensate for missing values
2385 for( i = n1; i < n; i++ )
2386 rsum -= responses[sorted_indices[i]];
2387
2388 // find the optimal split
2389 for( i = 0; i < n1 - 1; i++ )
2390 {
2391 float t = responses[sorted_indices[i]];
2392 L++; R--;
2393 lsum += t;
2394 rsum -= t;
2395
2396 if( values[i] + epsilon < values[i+1] )
2397 {
2398 double val = (lsum*lsum*R + rsum*rsum*L)/((double)L*R);
2399 if( best_val < val )
2400 {
2401 best_val = val;
2402 best_i = i;
2403 }
2404 }
2405 }
2406
2407 CvDTreeSplit* split = 0;
2408 if( best_i >= 0 )
2409 {
2410 split = _split ? _split : data->new_split_ord( 0, 0.0f, 0, 0, 0.0f );
2411 split->var_idx = vi;
2412 split->ord.c = (values[best_i] + values[best_i+1])*0.5f;
2413 split->ord.split_point = best_i;
2414 split->inversed = 0;
2415 split->quality = (float)best_val;
2416 }
2417 return split;
2418}
2419
2420CvDTreeSplit* CvDTree::find_split_cat_reg( CvDTreeNode* node, int vi, float init_quality, CvDTreeSplit* _split, uchar* _ext_buf )
2421{
2422 int ci = data->get_var_type(vi);
2423 int n = node->sample_count;
2424 int mi = data->cat_count->data.i[ci];
2425
2426 int base_size = (mi+2)*sizeof(double) + (mi+1)*(sizeof(int) + sizeof(double*));
2427 cv::AutoBuffer<uchar> inn_buf(base_size);
2428 if( !_ext_buf )
2429 inn_buf.allocate(base_size + n*(2*sizeof(int) + sizeof(float)));
2430 uchar* base_buf = (uchar*)inn_buf;
2431 uchar* ext_buf = _ext_buf ? _ext_buf : base_buf + base_size;
2432 int* labels_buf = (int*)ext_buf;
2433 const int* labels = data->get_cat_var_data(node, vi, labels_buf);
2434 float* responses_buf = (float*)(labels_buf + n);
2435 int* sample_indices_buf = (int*)(responses_buf + n);
2436 const float* responses = data->get_ord_responses(node, responses_buf, sample_indices_buf);
2437
2438 double* sum = (double*)cv::alignPtr(base_buf,sizeof(double)) + 1;
2439 int* counts = (int*)(sum + mi) + 1;
2440 double** sum_ptr = (double**)(counts + mi);
2441 int i, L = 0, R = 0;
2442 double best_val = init_quality, lsum = 0, rsum = 0;
2443 int best_subset = -1, subset_i;
2444
2445 for( i = -1; i < mi; i++ )
2446 sum[i] = counts[i] = 0;
2447
2448 // calculate sum response and weight of each category of the input var
2449 for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
2450 {
2451 int idx = ( (labels[i] == 65535) && data->is_buf_16u ) ? -1 : labels[i];
2452 double s = sum[idx] + responses[i];
2453 int nc = counts[idx] + 1;
2454 sum[idx] = s;
2455 counts[idx] = nc;
2456 }
2457
2458 // calculate average response in each category
2459 for( i = 0; i < mi; i++ )
2460 {
2461 R += counts[i];
2462 rsum += sum[i];
2463 sum[i] /= MAX(counts[i],1);
2464 sum_ptr[i] = sum + i;
2465 }
2466
2467 icvSortDblPtr( sum_ptr, mi, 0 );
2468
2469 // revert back to unnormalized sums
2470 // (there should be a very little loss of accuracy)
2471 for( i = 0; i < mi; i++ )
2472 sum[i] *= counts[i];
2473
2474 for( subset_i = 0; subset_i < mi-1; subset_i++ )
2475 {
2476 int idx = (int)(sum_ptr[subset_i] - sum);
2477 int ni = counts[idx];
2478
2479 if( ni )
2480 {
2481 double s = sum[idx];
2482 lsum += s; L += ni;
2483 rsum -= s; R -= ni;
2484
2485 if( L && R )
2486 {
2487 double val = (lsum*lsum*R + rsum*rsum*L)/((double)L*R);
2488 if( best_val < val )
2489 {
2490 best_val = val;
2491 best_subset = subset_i;
2492 }
2493 }
2494 }
2495 }
2496
2497 CvDTreeSplit* split = 0;
2498 if( best_subset >= 0 )
2499 {
2500 split = _split ? _split : data->new_split_cat( 0, -1.0f);
2501 split->var_idx = vi;
2502 split->quality = (float)best_val;
2503 memset( split->subset, 0, (data->max_c_count + 31)/32 * sizeof(int));
2504 for( i = 0; i <= best_subset; i++ )
2505 {
2506 int idx = (int)(sum_ptr[i] - sum);
2507 split->subset[idx >> 5] |= 1 << (idx & 31);
2508 }
2509 }
2510 return split;
2511}
2512
2513CvDTreeSplit* CvDTree::find_surrogate_split_ord( CvDTreeNode* node, int vi, uchar* _ext_buf )
2514{
2515 const float epsilon = FLT_EPSILON*2;
2516 const char* dir = (char*)data->direction->data.ptr;
2517 int n = node->sample_count, n1 = node->get_num_valid(vi);
2518 cv::AutoBuffer<uchar> inn_buf;
2519 if( !_ext_buf )
2520 inn_buf.allocate( n*(sizeof(int)*(data->have_priors ? 3 : 2) + sizeof(float)) );
2521 uchar* ext_buf = _ext_buf ? _ext_buf : (uchar*)inn_buf;
2522 float* values_buf = (float*)ext_buf;
2523 int* sorted_indices_buf = (int*)(values_buf + n);
2524 int* sample_indices_buf = sorted_indices_buf + n;
2525 const float* values = 0;
2526 const int* sorted_indices = 0;
2527 data->get_ord_var_data( node, vi, values_buf, sorted_indices_buf, &values, &sorted_indices, sample_indices_buf );
2528 // LL - number of samples that both the primary and the surrogate splits send to the left
2529 // LR - ... primary split sends to the left and the surrogate split sends to the right
2530 // RL - ... primary split sends to the right and the surrogate split sends to the left
2531 // RR - ... both send to the right
2532 int i, best_i = -1, best_inversed = 0;
2533 double best_val;
2534
2535 if( !data->have_priors )
2536 {
2537 int LL = 0, RL = 0, LR, RR;
2538 int worst_val = cvFloor(node->maxlr), _best_val = worst_val;
2539 int sum = 0, sum_abs = 0;
2540
2541 for( i = 0; i < n1; i++ )
2542 {
2543 int d = dir[sorted_indices[i]];
2544 sum += d; sum_abs += d & 1;
2545 }
2546
2547 // sum_abs = R + L; sum = R - L
2548 RR = (sum_abs + sum) >> 1;
2549 LR = (sum_abs - sum) >> 1;
2550
2551 // initially all the samples are sent to the right by the surrogate split,
2552 // LR of them are sent to the left by primary split, and RR - to the right.
2553 // now iteratively compute LL, LR, RL and RR for every possible surrogate split value.
2554 for( i = 0; i < n1 - 1; i++ )
2555 {
2556 int d = dir[sorted_indices[i]];
2557
2558 if( d < 0 )
2559 {
2560 LL++; LR--;
2561 if( LL + RR > _best_val && values[i] + epsilon < values[i+1] )
2562 {
2563 best_val = LL + RR;
2564 best_i = i; best_inversed = 0;
2565 }
2566 }
2567 else if( d > 0 )
2568 {
2569 RL++; RR--;
2570 if( RL + LR > _best_val && values[i] + epsilon < values[i+1] )
2571 {
2572 best_val = RL + LR;
2573 best_i = i; best_inversed = 1;
2574 }
2575 }
2576 }
2577 best_val = _best_val;
2578 }
2579 else
2580 {
2581 double LL = 0, RL = 0, LR, RR;
2582 double worst_val = node->maxlr;
2583 double sum = 0, sum_abs = 0;
2584 const double* priors = data->priors_mult->data.db;
2585 int* responses_buf = sample_indices_buf + n;
2586 const int* responses = data->get_class_labels(node, responses_buf);
2587 best_val = worst_val;
2588
2589 for( i = 0; i < n1; i++ )
2590 {
2591 int idx = sorted_indices[i];
2592 double w = priors[responses[idx]];
2593 int d = dir[idx];
2594 sum += d*w; sum_abs += (d & 1)*w;
2595 }
2596
2597 // sum_abs = R + L; sum = R - L
2598 RR = (sum_abs + sum)*0.5;
2599 LR = (sum_abs - sum)*0.5;
2600
2601 // initially all the samples are sent to the right by the surrogate split,
2602 // LR of them are sent to the left by primary split, and RR - to the right.
2603 // now iteratively compute LL, LR, RL and RR for every possible surrogate split value.
2604 for( i = 0; i < n1 - 1; i++ )
2605 {
2606 int idx = sorted_indices[i];
2607 double w = priors[responses[idx]];
2608 int d = dir[idx];
2609
2610 if( d < 0 )
2611 {
2612 LL += w; LR -= w;
2613 if( LL + RR > best_val && values[i] + epsilon < values[i+1] )
2614 {
2615 best_val = LL + RR;
2616 best_i = i; best_inversed = 0;
2617 }
2618 }
2619 else if( d > 0 )
2620 {
2621 RL += w; RR -= w;
2622 if( RL + LR > best_val && values[i] + epsilon < values[i+1] )
2623 {
2624 best_val = RL + LR;
2625 best_i = i; best_inversed = 1;
2626 }
2627 }
2628 }
2629 }
2630 return best_i >= 0 && best_val > node->maxlr ? data->new_split_ord( vi,
2631 (values[best_i] + values[best_i+1])*0.5f, best_i, best_inversed, (float)best_val ) : 0;
2632}
2633
2634
2635CvDTreeSplit* CvDTree::find_surrogate_split_cat( CvDTreeNode* node, int vi, uchar* _ext_buf )
2636{
2637 const char* dir = (char*)data->direction->data.ptr;
2638 int n = node->sample_count;
2639 int i, mi = data->cat_count->data.i[data->get_var_type(vi)], l_win = 0;
2640
2641 int base_size = (2*(mi+1)+1)*sizeof(double) + (!data->have_priors ? 2*(mi+1)*sizeof(int) : 0);
2642 cv::AutoBuffer<uchar> inn_buf(base_size);
2643 if( !_ext_buf )
2644 inn_buf.allocate(base_size + n*(sizeof(int) + (data->have_priors ? sizeof(int) : 0)));
2645 uchar* base_buf = (uchar*)inn_buf;
2646 uchar* ext_buf = _ext_buf ? _ext_buf : base_buf + base_size;
2647
2648 int* labels_buf = (int*)ext_buf;
2649 const int* labels = data->get_cat_var_data(node, vi, labels_buf);
2650 // LL - number of samples that both the primary and the surrogate splits send to the left
2651 // LR - ... primary split sends to the left and the surrogate split sends to the right
2652 // RL - ... primary split sends to the right and the surrogate split sends to the left
2653 // RR - ... both send to the right
2654 CvDTreeSplit* split = data->new_split_cat( vi, 0 );
2655 double best_val = 0;
2656 double* lc = (double*)cv::alignPtr(base_buf,sizeof(double)) + 1;
2657 double* rc = lc + mi + 1;
2658
2659 for( i = -1; i < mi; i++ )
2660 lc[i] = rc[i] = 0;
2661
2662 // for each category calculate the weight of samples
2663 // sent to the left (lc) and to the right (rc) by the primary split
2664 if( !data->have_priors )
2665 {
2666 int* _lc = (int*)rc + 1;
2667 int* _rc = _lc + mi + 1;
2668
2669 for( i = -1; i < mi; i++ )
2670 _lc[i] = _rc[i] = 0;
2671
2672 for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
2673 {
2674 int idx = ( (labels[i] == 65535) && (data->is_buf_16u) ) ? -1 : labels[i];
2675 int d = dir[i];
2676 int sum = _lc[idx] + d;
2677 int sum_abs = _rc[idx] + (d & 1);
2678 _lc[idx] = sum; _rc[idx] = sum_abs;
2679 }
2680
2681 for( i = 0; i < mi; i++ )
2682 {
2683 int sum = _lc[i];
2684 int sum_abs = _rc[i];
2685 lc[i] = (sum_abs - sum) >> 1;
2686 rc[i] = (sum_abs + sum) >> 1;
2687 }
2688 }
2689 else
2690 {
2691 const double* priors = data->priors_mult->data.db;
2692 int* responses_buf = labels_buf + n;
2693 const int* responses = data->get_class_labels(node, responses_buf);
2694
2695 for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
2696 {
2697 int idx = ( (labels[i] == 65535) && (data->is_buf_16u) ) ? -1 : labels[i];
2698 double w = priors[responses[i]];
2699 int d = dir[i];
2700 double sum = lc[idx] + d*w;
2701 double sum_abs = rc[idx] + (d & 1)*w;
2702 lc[idx] = sum; rc[idx] = sum_abs;
2703 }
2704
2705 for( i = 0; i < mi; i++ )
2706 {
2707 double sum = lc[i];
2708 double sum_abs = rc[i];
2709 lc[i] = (sum_abs - sum) * 0.5;
2710 rc[i] = (sum_abs + sum) * 0.5;
2711 }
2712 }
2713
2714 // 2. now form the split.
2715 // in each category send all the samples to the same direction as majority
2716 for( i = 0; i < mi; i++ )
2717 {
2718 double lval = lc[i], rval = rc[i];
2719 if( lval > rval )
2720 {
2721 split->subset[i >> 5] |= 1 << (i & 31);
2722 best_val += lval;
2723 l_win++;
2724 }
2725 else
2726 best_val += rval;
2727 }
2728
2729 split->quality = (float)best_val;
2730 if( split->quality <= node->maxlr || l_win == 0 || l_win == mi )
2731 cvSetRemoveByPtr( data->split_heap, split ), split = 0;
2732
2733 return split;
2734}
2735
2736
2737void CvDTree::calc_node_value( CvDTreeNode* node )
2738{
2739 int i, j, k, n = node->sample_count, cv_n = data->params.cv_folds;
2740 int m = data->get_num_classes();
2741
2742 int base_size = data->is_classifier ? m*cv_n*sizeof(int) : 2*cv_n*sizeof(double)+cv_n*sizeof(int);
2743 int ext_size = n*(sizeof(int) + (data->is_classifier ? sizeof(int) : sizeof(int)+sizeof(float)));
2744 cv::AutoBuffer<uchar> inn_buf(base_size + ext_size);
2745 uchar* base_buf = (uchar*)inn_buf;
2746 uchar* ext_buf = base_buf + base_size;
2747
2748 int* cv_labels_buf = (int*)ext_buf;
2749 const int* cv_labels = data->get_cv_labels(node, cv_labels_buf);
2750
2751 if( data->is_classifier )
2752 {
2753 // in case of classification tree:
2754 // * node value is the label of the class that has the largest weight in the node.
2755 // * node risk is the weighted number of misclassified samples,
2756 // * j-th cross-validation fold value and risk are calculated as above,
2757 // but using the samples with cv_labels(*)!=j.
2758 // * j-th cross-validation fold error is calculated as the weighted number of
2759 // misclassified samples with cv_labels(*)==j.
2760
2761 // compute the number of instances of each class
2762 int* cls_count = data->counts->data.i;
2763 int* responses_buf = cv_labels_buf + n;
2764 const int* responses = data->get_class_labels(node, responses_buf);
2765 int* cv_cls_count = (int*)base_buf;
2766 double max_val = -1, total_weight = 0;
2767 int max_k = -1;
2768 double* priors = data->priors_mult->data.db;
2769
2770 for( k = 0; k < m; k++ )
2771 cls_count[k] = 0;
2772
2773 if( cv_n == 0 )
2774 {
2775 for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
2776 cls_count[responses[i]]++;
2777 }
2778 else
2779 {
2780 for( j = 0; j < cv_n; j++ )
2781 for( k = 0; k < m; k++ )
2782 cv_cls_count[j*m + k] = 0;
2783
2784 for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
2785 {
2786 j = cv_labels[i]; k = responses[i];
2787 cv_cls_count[j*m + k]++;
2788 }
2789
2790 for( j = 0; j < cv_n; j++ )
2791 for( k = 0; k < m; k++ )
2792 cls_count[k] += cv_cls_count[j*m + k];
2793 }
2794
2795 if( data->have_priors && node->parent == 0 )
2796 {
2797 // compute priors_mult from priors, take the sample ratio into account.
2798 double sum = 0;
2799 for( k = 0; k < m; k++ )
2800 {
2801 int n_k = cls_count[k];
2802 priors[k] = data->priors->data.db[k]*(n_k ? 1./n_k : 0.);
2803 sum += priors[k];
2804 }
2805 sum = 1./sum;
2806 for( k = 0; k < m; k++ )
2807 priors[k] *= sum;
2808 }
2809
2810 for( k = 0; k < m; k++ )
2811 {
2812 double val = cls_count[k]*priors[k];
2813 total_weight += val;
2814 if( max_val < val )
2815 {
2816 max_val = val;
2817 max_k = k;
2818 }
2819 }
2820
2821 node->class_idx = max_k;
2822 node->value = data->cat_map->data.i[
2823 data->cat_ofs->data.i[data->cat_var_count] + max_k];
2824 node->node_risk = total_weight - max_val;
2825
2826 for( j = 0; j < cv_n; j++ )
2827 {
2828 double sum_k = 0, sum = 0, max_val_k = 0;
2829 max_val = -1; max_k = -1;
2830
2831 for( k = 0; k < m; k++ )
2832 {
2833 double w = priors[k];
2834 double val_k = cv_cls_count[j*m + k]*w;
2835 double val = cls_count[k]*w - val_k;
2836 sum_k += val_k;
2837 sum += val;
2838 if( max_val < val )
2839 {
2840 max_val = val;
2841 max_val_k = val_k;
2842 max_k = k;
2843 }
2844 }
2845
2846 node->cv_Tn[j] = INT_MAX;
2847 node->cv_node_risk[j] = sum - max_val;
2848 node->cv_node_error[j] = sum_k - max_val_k;
2849 }
2850 }
2851 else
2852 {
2853 // in case of regression tree:
2854 // * node value is 1/n*sum_i(Y_i), where Y_i is i-th response,
2855 // n is the number of samples in the node.
2856 // * node risk is the sum of squared errors: sum_i((Y_i - <node_value>)^2)
2857 // * j-th cross-validation fold value and risk are calculated as above,
2858 // but using the samples with cv_labels(*)!=j.
2859 // * j-th cross-validation fold error is calculated
2860 // using samples with cv_labels(*)==j as the test subset:
2861 // error_j = sum_(i,cv_labels(i)==j)((Y_i - <node_value_j>)^2),
2862 // where node_value_j is the node value calculated
2863 // as described in the previous bullet, and summation is done
2864 // over the samples with cv_labels(*)==j.
2865
2866 double sum = 0, sum2 = 0;
2867 float* values_buf = (float*)(cv_labels_buf + n);
2868 int* sample_indices_buf = (int*)(values_buf + n);
2869 const float* values = data->get_ord_responses(node, values_buf, sample_indices_buf);
2870 double *cv_sum = 0, *cv_sum2 = 0;
2871 int* cv_count = 0;
2872
2873 if( cv_n == 0 )
2874 {
2875 for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
2876 {
2877 double t = values[i];
2878 sum += t;
2879 sum2 += t*t;
2880 }
2881 }
2882 else
2883 {
2884 cv_sum = (double*)base_buf;
2885 cv_sum2 = cv_sum + cv_n;
2886 cv_count = (int*)(cv_sum2 + cv_n);
2887
2888 for( j = 0; j < cv_n; j++ )
2889 {
2890 cv_sum[j] = cv_sum2[j] = 0.;
2891 cv_count[j] = 0;
2892 }
2893
2894 for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
2895 {
2896 j = cv_labels[i];
2897 double t = values[i];
2898 double s = cv_sum[j] + t;
2899 double s2 = cv_sum2[j] + t*t;
2900 int nc = cv_count[j] + 1;
2901 cv_sum[j] = s;
2902 cv_sum2[j] = s2;
2903 cv_count[j] = nc;
2904 }
2905
2906 for( j = 0; j < cv_n; j++ )
2907 {
2908 sum += cv_sum[j];
2909 sum2 += cv_sum2[j];
2910 }
2911 }
2912
2913 node->node_risk = sum2 - (sum/n)*sum;
2914 node->value = sum/n;
2915
2916 for( j = 0; j < cv_n; j++ )
2917 {
2918 double s = cv_sum[j], si = sum - s;
2919 double s2 = cv_sum2[j], s2i = sum2 - s2;
2920 int c = cv_count[j], ci = n - c;
2921 double r = si/MAX(ci,1);
2922 node->cv_node_risk[j] = s2i - r*r*ci;
2923 node->cv_node_error[j] = s2 - 2*r*s + c*r*r;
2924 node->cv_Tn[j] = INT_MAX;
2925 }
2926 }
2927}
2928
2929
2930void CvDTree::complete_node_dir( CvDTreeNode* node )
2931{
2932 int vi, i, n = node->sample_count, nl, nr, d0 = 0, d1 = -1;
2933 int nz = n - node->get_num_valid(node->split->var_idx);
2934 char* dir = (char*)data->direction->data.ptr;
2935
2936 // try to complete direction using surrogate splits
2937 if( nz && data->params.use_surrogates )
2938 {
2939 cv::AutoBuffer<uchar> inn_buf(n*(2*sizeof(int)+sizeof(float)));
2940 CvDTreeSplit* split = node->split->next;
2941 for( ; split != 0 && nz; split = split->next )
2942 {
2943 int inversed_mask = split->inversed ? -1 : 0;
2944 vi = split->var_idx;
2945
2946 if( data->get_var_type(vi) >= 0 ) // split on categorical var
2947 {
2948 int* labels_buf = (int*)(uchar*)inn_buf;
2949 const int* labels = data->get_cat_var_data(node, vi, labels_buf);
2950 const int* subset = split->subset;
2951
2952 for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
2953 {
2954 int idx = labels[i];
2955 if( !dir[i] && ( ((idx >= 0)&&(!data->is_buf_16u)) || ((idx != 65535)&&(data->is_buf_16u)) ))
2956
2957 {
2958 int d = CV_DTREE_CAT_DIR(idx,subset);
2959 dir[i] = (char)((d ^ inversed_mask) - inversed_mask);
2960 if( --nz )
2961 break;
2962 }
2963 }
2964 }
2965 else // split on ordered var
2966 {
2967 float* values_buf = (float*)(uchar*)inn_buf;
2968 int* sorted_indices_buf = (int*)(values_buf + n);
2969 int* sample_indices_buf = sorted_indices_buf + n;
2970 const float* values = 0;
2971 const int* sorted_indices = 0;
2972 data->get_ord_var_data( node, vi, values_buf, sorted_indices_buf, &values, &sorted_indices, sample_indices_buf );
2973 int split_point = split->ord.split_point;
2974 int n1 = node->get_num_valid(vi);
2975
2976 assert( 0 <= split_point && split_point < n-1 );
2977
2978 for( i = 0; i < n1; i++ )
2979 {
2980 int idx = sorted_indices[i];
2981 if( !dir[idx] )
2982 {
2983 int d = i <= split_point ? -1 : 1;
2984 dir[idx] = (char)((d ^ inversed_mask) - inversed_mask);
2985 if( --nz )
2986 break;
2987 }
2988 }
2989 }
2990 }
2991 }
2992
2993 // find the default direction for the rest
2994 if( nz )
2995 {
2996 for( i = nr = 0; i < n; i++ )
2997 nr += dir[i] > 0;
2998 nl = n - nr - nz;
2999 d0 = nl > nr ? -1 : nr > nl;
3000 }
3001
3002 // make sure that every sample is directed either to the left or to the right
3003 for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
3004 {
3005 int d = dir[i];
3006 if( !d )
3007 {
3008 d = d0;
3009 if( !d )
3010 d = d1, d1 = -d1;
3011 }
3012 d = d > 0;
3013 dir[i] = (char)d; // remap (-1,1) to (0,1)
3014 }
3015}
3016
3017
3018void CvDTree::split_node_data( CvDTreeNode* node )
3019{
3020 int vi, i, n = node->sample_count, nl, nr, scount = data->sample_count;
3021 char* dir = (char*)data->direction->data.ptr;
3022 CvDTreeNode *left = 0, *right = 0;
3023 int* new_idx = data->split_buf->data.i;
3024 int new_buf_idx = data->get_child_buf_idx( node );
3025 int work_var_count = data->get_work_var_count();
3026 CvMat* buf = data->buf;
3027 size_t length_buf_row = data->get_length_subbuf();
3028 cv::AutoBuffer<uchar> inn_buf(n*(3*sizeof(int) + sizeof(float)));
3029 int* temp_buf = (int*)(uchar*)inn_buf;
3030
3031 complete_node_dir(node);
3032
3033 for( i = nl = nr = 0; i < n; i++ )
3034 {
3035 int d = dir[i];
3036 // initialize new indices for splitting ordered variables
3037 new_idx[i] = (nl & (d-1)) | (nr & -d); // d ? ri : li
3038 nr += d;
3039 nl += d^1;
3040 }
3041
3042 bool split_input_data;
3043 node->left = left = data->new_node( node, nl, new_buf_idx, node->offset );
3044 node->right = right = data->new_node( node, nr, new_buf_idx, node->offset + nl );
3045
3046 split_input_data = node->depth + 1 < data->params.max_depth &&
3047 (node->left->sample_count > data->params.min_sample_count ||
3048 node->right->sample_count > data->params.min_sample_count);
3049
3050 // split ordered variables, keep both halves sorted.
3051 for( vi = 0; vi < data->var_count; vi++ )
3052 {
3053 int ci = data->get_var_type(vi);
3054
3055 if( ci >= 0 || !split_input_data )
3056 continue;
3057
3058 int n1 = node->get_num_valid(vi);
3059 float* src_val_buf = (float*)(uchar*)(temp_buf + n);
3060 int* src_sorted_idx_buf = (int*)(src_val_buf + n);
3061 int* src_sample_idx_buf = src_sorted_idx_buf + n;
3062 const float* src_val = 0;
3063 const int* src_sorted_idx = 0;
3064 data->get_ord_var_data(node, vi, src_val_buf, src_sorted_idx_buf, &src_val, &src_sorted_idx, src_sample_idx_buf);
3065
3066 for(i = 0; i < n; i++)
3067 temp_buf[i] = src_sorted_idx[i];
3068
3069 if (data->is_buf_16u)
3070 {
3071 unsigned short *ldst, *rdst, *ldst0, *rdst0;
3072 //unsigned short tl, tr;
3073 ldst0 = ldst = (unsigned short*)(buf->data.s + left->buf_idx*length_buf_row +
3074 vi*scount + left->offset);
3075 rdst0 = rdst = (unsigned short*)(ldst + nl);
3076
3077 // split sorted
3078 for( i = 0; i < n1; i++ )
3079 {
3080 int idx = temp_buf[i];
3081 int d = dir[idx];
3082 idx = new_idx[idx];
3083 if (d)
3084 {
3085 *rdst = (unsigned short)idx;
3086 rdst++;
3087 }
3088 else
3089 {
3090 *ldst = (unsigned short)idx;
3091 ldst++;
3092 }
3093 }
3094
3095 left->set_num_valid(vi, (int)(ldst - ldst0));
3096 right->set_num_valid(vi, (int)(rdst - rdst0));
3097
3098 // split missing
3099 for( ; i < n; i++ )
3100 {
3101 int idx = temp_buf[i];
3102 int d = dir[idx];
3103 idx = new_idx[idx];
3104 if (d)
3105 {
3106 *rdst = (unsigned short)idx;
3107 rdst++;
3108 }
3109 else
3110 {
3111 *ldst = (unsigned short)idx;
3112 ldst++;
3113 }
3114 }
3115 }
3116 else
3117 {
3118 int *ldst0, *ldst, *rdst0, *rdst;
3119 ldst0 = ldst = buf->data.i + left->buf_idx*length_buf_row +
3120 vi*scount + left->offset;
3121 rdst0 = rdst = buf->data.i + right->buf_idx*length_buf_row +
3122 vi*scount + right->offset;
3123
3124 // split sorted
3125 for( i = 0; i < n1; i++ )
3126 {
3127 int idx = temp_buf[i];
3128 int d = dir[idx];
3129 idx = new_idx[idx];
3130 if (d)
3131 {
3132 *rdst = idx;
3133 rdst++;
3134 }
3135 else
3136 {
3137 *ldst = idx;
3138 ldst++;
3139 }
3140 }
3141
3142 left->set_num_valid(vi, (int)(ldst - ldst0));
3143 right->set_num_valid(vi, (int)(rdst - rdst0));
3144
3145 // split missing
3146 for( ; i < n; i++ )
3147 {
3148 int idx = temp_buf[i];
3149 int d = dir[idx];
3150 idx = new_idx[idx];
3151 if (d)
3152 {
3153 *rdst = idx;
3154 rdst++;
3155 }
3156 else
3157 {
3158 *ldst = idx;
3159 ldst++;
3160 }
3161 }
3162 }
3163 }
3164
3165 // split categorical vars, responses and cv_labels using new_idx relocation table
3166 for( vi = 0; vi < work_var_count; vi++ )
3167 {
3168 int ci = data->get_var_type(vi);
3169 int n1 = node->get_num_valid(vi), nr1 = 0;
3170
3171 if( ci < 0 || (vi < data->var_count && !split_input_data) )
3172 continue;
3173
3174 int *src_lbls_buf = temp_buf + n;
3175 const int* src_lbls = data->get_cat_var_data(node, vi, src_lbls_buf);
3176
3177 for(i = 0; i < n; i++)
3178 temp_buf[i] = src_lbls[i];
3179
3180 if (data->is_buf_16u)
3181 {
3182 unsigned short *ldst = (unsigned short *)(buf->data.s + left->buf_idx*length_buf_row +
3183 vi*scount + left->offset);
3184 unsigned short *rdst = (unsigned short *)(buf->data.s + right->buf_idx*length_buf_row +
3185 vi*scount + right->offset);
3186
3187 for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
3188 {
3189 int d = dir[i];
3190 int idx = temp_buf[i];
3191 if (d)
3192 {
3193 *rdst = (unsigned short)idx;
3194 rdst++;
3195 nr1 += (idx != 65535 )&d;
3196 }
3197 else
3198 {
3199 *ldst = (unsigned short)idx;
3200 ldst++;
3201 }
3202 }
3203
3204 if( vi < data->var_count )
3205 {
3206 left->set_num_valid(vi, n1 - nr1);
3207 right->set_num_valid(vi, nr1);
3208 }
3209 }
3210 else
3211 {
3212 int *ldst = buf->data.i + left->buf_idx*length_buf_row +
3213 vi*scount + left->offset;
3214 int *rdst = buf->data.i + right->buf_idx*length_buf_row +
3215 vi*scount + right->offset;
3216
3217 for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
3218 {
3219 int d = dir[i];
3220 int idx = temp_buf[i];
3221 if (d)
3222 {
3223 *rdst = idx;
3224 rdst++;
3225 nr1 += (idx >= 0)&d;
3226 }
3227 else
3228 {
3229 *ldst = idx;
3230 ldst++;
3231 }
3232
3233 }
3234
3235 if( vi < data->var_count )
3236 {
3237 left->set_num_valid(vi, n1 - nr1);
3238 right->set_num_valid(vi, nr1);
3239 }
3240 }
3241 }
3242
3243
3244 // split sample indices
3245 int *sample_idx_src_buf = temp_buf + n;
3246 const int* sample_idx_src = data->get_sample_indices(node, sample_idx_src_buf);
3247
3248 for(i = 0; i < n; i++)
3249 temp_buf[i] = sample_idx_src[i];
3250
3251 int pos = data->get_work_var_count();
3252 if (data->is_buf_16u)
3253 {
3254 unsigned short* ldst = (unsigned short*)(buf->data.s + left->buf_idx*length_buf_row +
3255 pos*scount + left->offset);
3256 unsigned short* rdst = (unsigned short*)(buf->data.s + right->buf_idx*length_buf_row +
3257 pos*scount + right->offset);
3258 for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
3259 {
3260 int d = dir[i];
3261 unsigned short idx = (unsigned short)temp_buf[i];
3262 if (d)
3263 {
3264 *rdst = idx;
3265 rdst++;
3266 }
3267 else
3268 {
3269 *ldst = idx;
3270 ldst++;
3271 }
3272 }
3273 }
3274 else
3275 {
3276 int* ldst = buf->data.i + left->buf_idx*length_buf_row +
3277 pos*scount + left->offset;
3278 int* rdst = buf->data.i + right->buf_idx*length_buf_row +
3279 pos*scount + right->offset;
3280 for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
3281 {
3282 int d = dir[i];
3283 int idx = temp_buf[i];
3284 if (d)
3285 {
3286 *rdst = idx;
3287 rdst++;
3288 }
3289 else
3290 {
3291 *ldst = idx;
3292 ldst++;
3293 }
3294 }
3295 }
3296
3297 // deallocate the parent node data that is not needed anymore
3298 data->free_node_data(node);
3299}
3300
3301float CvDTree::calc_error( CvMLData* _data, int type, vector<float> *resp )
3302{
3303 float err = 0;
3304 const CvMat* values = _data->get_values();
3305 const CvMat* response = _data->get_responses();
3306 const CvMat* missing = _data->get_missing();
3307 const CvMat* sample_idx = (type == CV_TEST_ERROR) ? _data->get_test_sample_idx() : _data->get_train_sample_idx();
3308 const CvMat* var_types = _data->get_var_types();
3309 int* sidx = sample_idx ? sample_idx->data.i : 0;
3310 int r_step = CV_IS_MAT_CONT(response->type) ?
3311 1 : response->step / CV_ELEM_SIZE(response->type);
3312 bool is_classifier = var_types->data.ptr[var_types->cols-1] == CV_VAR_CATEGORICAL;
3313 int sample_count = sample_idx ? sample_idx->cols : 0;
3314 sample_count = (type == CV_TRAIN_ERROR && sample_count == 0) ? values->rows : sample_count;
3315 float* pred_resp = 0;
3316 if( resp && (sample_count > 0) )
3317 {
3318 resp->resize( sample_count );
3319 pred_resp = &((*resp)[0]);
3320 }
3321
3322 if ( is_classifier )
3323 {
3324 for( int i = 0; i < sample_count; i++ )
3325 {
3326 CvMat sample, miss;
3327 int si = sidx ? sidx[i] : i;
3328 cvGetRow( values, &sample, si );
3329 if( missing )
3330 cvGetRow( missing, &miss, si );
3331 float r = (float)predict( &sample, missing ? &miss : 0 )->value;
3332 if( pred_resp )
3333 pred_resp[i] = r;
3334 int d = fabs((double)r - response->data.fl[(size_t)si*r_step]) <= FLT_EPSILON ? 0 : 1;
3335 err += d;
3336 }
3337 err = sample_count ? err / (float)sample_count * 100 : -FLT_MAX;
3338 }
3339 else
3340 {
3341 for( int i = 0; i < sample_count; i++ )
3342 {
3343 CvMat sample, miss;
3344 int si = sidx ? sidx[i] : i;
3345 cvGetRow( values, &sample, si );
3346 if( missing )
3347 cvGetRow( missing, &miss, si );
3348 float r = (float)predict( &sample, missing ? &miss : 0 )->value;
3349 if( pred_resp )
3350 pred_resp[i] = r;
3351 float d = r - response->data.fl[(size_t)si*r_step];
3352 err += d*d;
3353 }
3354 err = sample_count ? err / (float)sample_count : -FLT_MAX;
3355 }
3356 return err;
3357}
3358
3359void CvDTree::prune_cv()
3360{
3361 CvMat* ab = 0;
3362 CvMat* temp = 0;
3363 CvMat* err_jk = 0;
3364
3365 // 1. build tree sequence for each cv fold, calculate error_{Tj,beta_k}.
3366 // 2. choose the best tree index (if need, apply 1SE rule).
3367 // 3. store the best index and cut the branches.
3368
3369 CV_FUNCNAME( "CvDTree::prune_cv" );
3370
3371 __BEGIN__;
3372
3373 int ti, j, tree_count = 0, cv_n = data->params.cv_folds, n = root->sample_count;
3374 // currently, 1SE for regression is not implemented
3375 bool use_1se = data->params.use_1se_rule != 0 && data->is_classifier;
3376 double* err;
3377 double min_err = 0, min_err_se = 0;
3378 int min_idx = -1;
3379
3380 CV_CALL( ab = cvCreateMat( 1, 256, CV_64F ));
3381
3382 // build the main tree sequence, calculate alpha's
3383 for(;;tree_count++)
3384 {
3385 double min_alpha = update_tree_rnc(tree_count, -1);
3386 if( cut_tree(tree_count, -1, min_alpha) )
3387 break;
3388
3389 if( ab->cols <= tree_count )
3390 {
3391 CV_CALL( temp = cvCreateMat( 1, ab->cols*3/2, CV_64F ));
3392 for( ti = 0; ti < ab->cols; ti++ )
3393 temp->data.db[ti] = ab->data.db[ti];
3394 cvReleaseMat( &ab );
3395 ab = temp;
3396 temp = 0;
3397 }
3398
3399 ab->data.db[tree_count] = min_alpha;
3400 }
3401
3402 ab->data.db[0] = 0.;
3403
3404 if( tree_count > 0 )
3405 {
3406 for( ti = 1; ti < tree_count-1; ti++ )
3407 ab->data.db[ti] = sqrt(ab->data.db[ti]*ab->data.db[ti+1]);
3408 ab->data.db[tree_count-1] = DBL_MAX*0.5;
3409
3410 CV_CALL( err_jk = cvCreateMat( cv_n, tree_count, CV_64F ));
3411 err = err_jk->data.db;
3412
3413 for( j = 0; j < cv_n; j++ )
3414 {
3415 int tj = 0, tk = 0;
3416 for( ; tk < tree_count; tj++ )
3417 {
3418 double min_alpha = update_tree_rnc(tj, j);
3419 if( cut_tree(tj, j, min_alpha) )
3420 min_alpha = DBL_MAX;
3421
3422 for( ; tk < tree_count; tk++ )
3423 {
3424 if( ab->data.db[tk] > min_alpha )
3425 break;
3426 err[j*tree_count + tk] = root->tree_error;
3427 }
3428 }
3429 }
3430
3431 for( ti = 0; ti < tree_count; ti++ )
3432 {
3433 double sum_err = 0;
3434 for( j = 0; j < cv_n; j++ )
3435 sum_err += err[j*tree_count + ti];
3436 if( ti == 0 || sum_err < min_err )
3437 {
3438 min_err = sum_err;
3439 min_idx = ti;
3440 if( use_1se )
3441 min_err_se = sqrt( sum_err*(n - sum_err) );
3442 }
3443 else if( sum_err < min_err + min_err_se )
3444 min_idx = ti;
3445 }
3446 }
3447
3448 pruned_tree_idx = min_idx;
3449 free_prune_data(data->params.truncate_pruned_tree != 0);
3450
3451 __END__;
3452
3453 cvReleaseMat( &err_jk );
3454 cvReleaseMat( &ab );
3455 cvReleaseMat( &temp );
3456}
3457
3458
3459double CvDTree::update_tree_rnc( int T, int fold )
3460{
3461 CvDTreeNode* node = root;
3462 double min_alpha = DBL_MAX;
3463
3464 for(;;)
3465 {
3466 CvDTreeNode* parent;
3467 for(;;)
3468 {
3469 int t = fold >= 0 ? node->cv_Tn[fold] : node->Tn;
3470 if( t <= T || !node->left )
3471 {
3472 node->complexity = 1;
3473 node->tree_risk = node->node_risk;
3474 node->tree_error = 0.;
3475 if( fold >= 0 )
3476 {
3477 node->tree_risk = node->cv_node_risk[fold];
3478 node->tree_error = node->cv_node_error[fold];
3479 }
3480 break;
3481 }
3482 node = node->left;
3483 }
3484
3485 for( parent = node->parent; parent && parent->right == node;
3486 node = parent, parent = parent->parent )
3487 {
3488 parent->complexity += node->complexity;
3489 parent->tree_risk += node->tree_risk;
3490 parent->tree_error += node->tree_error;
3491
3492 parent->alpha = ((fold >= 0 ? parent->cv_node_risk[fold] : parent->node_risk)
3493 - parent->tree_risk)/(parent->complexity - 1);
3494 min_alpha = MIN( min_alpha, parent->alpha );
3495 }
3496
3497 if( !parent )
3498 break;
3499
3500 parent->complexity = node->complexity;
3501 parent->tree_risk = node->tree_risk;
3502 parent->tree_error = node->tree_error;
3503 node = parent->right;
3504 }
3505
3506 return min_alpha;
3507}
3508
3509
3510int CvDTree::cut_tree( int T, int fold, double min_alpha )
3511{
3512 CvDTreeNode* node = root;
3513 if( !node->left )
3514 return 1;
3515
3516 for(;;)
3517 {
3518 CvDTreeNode* parent;
3519 for(;;)
3520 {
3521 int t = fold >= 0 ? node->cv_Tn[fold] : node->Tn;
3522 if( t <= T || !node->left )
3523 break;
3524 if( node->alpha <= min_alpha + FLT_EPSILON )
3525 {
3526 if( fold >= 0 )
3527 node->cv_Tn[fold] = T;
3528 else
3529 node->Tn = T;
3530 if( node == root )
3531 return 1;
3532 break;
3533 }
3534 node = node->left;
3535 }
3536
3537 for( parent = node->parent; parent && parent->right == node;
3538 node = parent, parent = parent->parent )
3539 ;
3540
3541 if( !parent )
3542 break;
3543
3544 node = parent->right;
3545 }
3546
3547 return 0;
3548}
3549
3550
3551void CvDTree::free_prune_data(bool _cut_tree)
3552{
3553 CvDTreeNode* node = root;
3554
3555 for(;;)
3556 {
3557 CvDTreeNode* parent;
3558 for(;;)
3559 {
3560 // do not call cvSetRemoveByPtr( cv_heap, node->cv_Tn )
3561 // as we will clear the whole cross-validation heap at the end
3562 node->cv_Tn = 0;
3563 node->cv_node_error = node->cv_node_risk = 0;
3564 if( !node->left )
3565 break;
3566 node = node->left;
3567 }
3568
3569 for( parent = node->parent; parent && parent->right == node;
3570 node = parent, parent = parent->parent )
3571 {
3572 if( _cut_tree && parent->Tn <= pruned_tree_idx )
3573 {
3574 data->free_node( parent->left );
3575 data->free_node( parent->right );
3576 parent->left = parent->right = 0;
3577 }
3578 }
3579
3580 if( !parent )
3581 break;
3582
3583 node = parent->right;
3584 }
3585
3586 if( data->cv_heap )
3587 cvClearSet( data->cv_heap );
3588}
3589
3590
3591void CvDTree::free_tree()
3592{
3593 if( root && data && data->shared )
3594 {
3595 pruned_tree_idx = INT_MIN;
3596 free_prune_data(true);
3597 data->free_node(root);
3598 root = 0;
3599 }
3600}
3601
3602CvDTreeNode* CvDTree::predict( const CvMat* _sample,
3603 const CvMat* _missing, bool preprocessed_input ) const
3604{
3605 cv::AutoBuffer<int> catbuf;
3606
3607 int i, mstep = 0;
3608 const uchar* m = 0;
3609 CvDTreeNode* node = root;
3610
3611 if( !node )
3612 CV_Error( CV_StsError, "The tree has not been trained yet" );
3613
3614 if( !CV_IS_MAT(_sample) || CV_MAT_TYPE(_sample->type) != CV_32FC1 ||
3615 (_sample->cols != 1 && _sample->rows != 1) ||
3616 (_sample->cols + _sample->rows - 1 != data->var_all && !preprocessed_input) ||
3617 (_sample->cols + _sample->rows - 1 != data->var_count && preprocessed_input) )
3618 CV_Error( CV_StsBadArg,
3619 "the input sample must be 1d floating-point vector with the same "
3620 "number of elements as the total number of variables used for training" );
3621
3622 const float* sample = _sample->data.fl;
3623 int step = CV_IS_MAT_CONT(_sample->type) ? 1 : _sample->step/sizeof(sample[0]);
3624
3625 if( data->cat_count && !preprocessed_input ) // cache for categorical variables
3626 {
3627 int n = data->cat_count->cols;
3628 catbuf.allocate(n);
3629 for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
3630 catbuf[i] = -1;
3631 }
3632
3633 if( _missing )
3634 {
3635 if( !CV_IS_MAT(_missing) || !CV_IS_MASK_ARR(_missing) ||
3636 !CV_ARE_SIZES_EQ(_missing, _sample) )
3637 CV_Error( CV_StsBadArg,
3638 "the missing data mask must be 8-bit vector of the same size as input sample" );
3639 m = _missing->data.ptr;
3640 mstep = CV_IS_MAT_CONT(_missing->type) ? 1 : _missing->step/sizeof(m[0]);
3641 }
3642
3643 const int* vtype = data->var_type->data.i;
3644 const int* vidx = data->var_idx && !preprocessed_input ? data->var_idx->data.i : 0;
3645 const int* cmap = data->cat_map ? data->cat_map->data.i : 0;
3646 const int* cofs = data->cat_ofs ? data->cat_ofs->data.i : 0;
3647
3648 while( node->Tn > pruned_tree_idx && node->left )
3649 {
3650 CvDTreeSplit* split = node->split;
3651 int dir = 0;
3652 for( ; !dir && split != 0; split = split->next )
3653 {
3654 int vi = split->var_idx;
3655 int ci = vtype[vi];
3656 i = vidx ? vidx[vi] : vi;
3657 float val = sample[(size_t)i*step];
3658 if( m && m[(size_t)i*mstep] )
3659 continue;
3660 if( ci < 0 ) // ordered
3661 dir = val <= split->ord.c ? -1 : 1;
3662 else // categorical
3663 {
3664 int c;
3665 if( preprocessed_input )
3666 c = cvRound(val);
3667 else
3668 {
3669 c = catbuf[ci];
3670 if( c < 0 )
3671 {
3672 int a = c = cofs[ci];
3673 int b = (ci+1 >= data->cat_ofs->cols) ? data->cat_map->cols : cofs[ci+1];
3674
3675 int ival = cvRound(val);
3676 if( ival != val )
3677 CV_Error( CV_StsBadArg,
3678 "one of input categorical variable is not an integer" );
3679
3680 int sh = 0;
3681 while( a < b )
3682 {
3683 sh++;
3684 c = (a + b) >> 1;
3685 if( ival < cmap[c] )
3686 b = c;
3687 else if( ival > cmap[c] )
3688 a = c+1;
3689 else
3690 break;
3691 }
3692
3693 if( c < 0 || ival != cmap[c] )
3694 continue;
3695
3696 catbuf[ci] = c -= cofs[ci];
3697 }
3698 }
3699 c = ( (c == 65535) && data->is_buf_16u ) ? -1 : c;
3700 dir = CV_DTREE_CAT_DIR(c, split->subset);
3701 }
3702
3703 if( split->inversed )
3704 dir = -dir;
3705 }
3706
3707 if( !dir )
3708 {
3709 double diff = node->right->sample_count - node->left->sample_count;
3710 dir = diff < 0 ? -1 : 1;
3711 }
3712 node = dir < 0 ? node->left : node->right;
3713 }
3714
3715 return node;
3716}
3717
3718
3719CvDTreeNode* CvDTree::predict( const Mat& _sample, const Mat& _missing, bool preprocessed_input ) const
3720{
3721 CvMat sample = _sample, mmask = _missing;
3722 return predict(&sample, mmask.data.ptr ? &mmask : 0, preprocessed_input);
3723}
3724
3725
3726const CvMat* CvDTree::get_var_importance()
3727{
3728 if( !var_importance )
3729 {
3730 CvDTreeNode* node = root;
3731 double* importance;
3732 if( !node )
3733 return 0;
3734 var_importance = cvCreateMat( 1, data->var_count, CV_64F );
3735 cvZero( var_importance );
3736 importance = var_importance->data.db;
3737
3738 for(;;)
3739 {
3740 CvDTreeNode* parent;
3741 for( ;; node = node->left )
3742 {
3743 CvDTreeSplit* split = node->split;
3744
3745 if( !node->left || node->Tn <= pruned_tree_idx )
3746 break;
3747
3748 for( ; split != 0; split = split->next )
3749 importance[split->var_idx] += split->quality;
3750 }
3751
3752 for( parent = node->parent; parent && parent->right == node;
3753 node = parent, parent = parent->parent )
3754 ;
3755
3756 if( !parent )
3757 break;
3758
3759 node = parent->right;
3760 }
3761
3762 cvNormalize( var_importance, var_importance, 1., 0, CV_L1 );
3763 }
3764
3765 return var_importance;
3766}
3767
3768
3769void CvDTree::write_split( CvFileStorage* fs, CvDTreeSplit* split ) const
3770{
3771 int ci;
3772
3773 cvStartWriteStruct( fs, 0, CV_NODE_MAP + CV_NODE_FLOW );
3774 cvWriteInt( fs, "var", split->var_idx );
3775 cvWriteReal( fs, "quality", split->quality );
3776
3777 ci = data->get_var_type(split->var_idx);
3778 if( ci >= 0 ) // split on a categorical var
3779 {
3780 int i, n = data->cat_count->data.i[ci], to_right = 0, default_dir;
3781 for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
3782 to_right += CV_DTREE_CAT_DIR(i,split->subset) > 0;
3783
3784 // ad-hoc rule when to use inverse categorical split notation
3785 // to achieve more compact and clear representation
3786 default_dir = to_right <= 1 || to_right <= MIN(3, n/2) || to_right <= n/3 ? -1 : 1;
3787
3788 cvStartWriteStruct( fs, default_dir*(split->inversed ? -1 : 1) > 0 ?
3789 "in" : "not_in", CV_NODE_SEQ+CV_NODE_FLOW );
3790
3791 for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
3792 {
3793 int dir = CV_DTREE_CAT_DIR(i,split->subset);
3794 if( dir*default_dir < 0 )
3795 cvWriteInt( fs, 0, i );
3796 }
3797 cvEndWriteStruct( fs );
3798 }
3799 else
3800 cvWriteReal( fs, !split->inversed ? "le" : "gt", split->ord.c );
3801
3802 cvEndWriteStruct( fs );
3803}
3804
3805
3806void CvDTree::write_node( CvFileStorage* fs, CvDTreeNode* node ) const
3807{
3808 CvDTreeSplit* split;
3809
3810 cvStartWriteStruct( fs, 0, CV_NODE_MAP );
3811
3812 cvWriteInt( fs, "depth", node->depth );
3813 cvWriteInt( fs, "sample_count", node->sample_count );
3814 cvWriteReal( fs, "value", node->value );
3815
3816 if( data->is_classifier )
3817 cvWriteInt( fs, "norm_class_idx", node->class_idx );
3818
3819 cvWriteInt( fs, "Tn", node->Tn );
3820 cvWriteInt( fs, "complexity", node->complexity );
3821 cvWriteReal( fs, "alpha", node->alpha );
3822 cvWriteReal( fs, "node_risk", node->node_risk );
3823 cvWriteReal( fs, "tree_risk", node->tree_risk );
3824 cvWriteReal( fs, "tree_error", node->tree_error );
3825
3826 if( node->left )
3827 {
3828 cvStartWriteStruct( fs, "splits", CV_NODE_SEQ );
3829
3830 for( split = node->split; split != 0; split = split->next )
3831 write_split( fs, split );
3832
3833 cvEndWriteStruct( fs );
3834 }
3835
3836 cvEndWriteStruct( fs );
3837}

3839
3840void CvDTree::write_tree_nodes( CvFileStorage* fs ) const
3841{
3842 //CV_FUNCNAME( "CvDTree::write_tree_nodes" );
3843
3844 __BEGIN__;
3845
3846 CvDTreeNode* node = root;
3847
3848 // traverse the tree and save all the nodes in depth-first order
3849 for(;;)
3850 {
3851 CvDTreeNode* parent;
3852 for(;;)
3853 {
3854 write_node( fs, node );
3855 if( !node->left )
3856 break;
3857 node = node->left;
3858 }
3859
3860 for( parent = node->parent; parent && parent->right == node;
3861 node = parent, parent = parent->parent )
3862 ;
3863
3864 if( !parent )
3865 break;
3866
3867 node = parent->right;
3868 }
3869
3870 __END__;
3871}

3873
3874void CvDTree::write( CvFileStorage* fs, const char* name ) const
3875{
3876 //CV_FUNCNAME( "CvDTree::write" );
3877
3878 __BEGIN__;
3879
3880 cvStartWriteStruct( fs, name, CV_NODE_MAP, CV_TYPE_NAME_ML_TREE );
3881
3882 //get_var_importance();
3883 data->write_params( fs );
3884 //if( var_importance )
3885 //cvWrite( fs, "var_importance", var_importance );
3886 write( fs );
3887
3888 cvEndWriteStruct( fs );
3889
3890 __END__;
3891}

3895{
3896 //CV_FUNCNAME( "CvDTree::write" );
3897
3898 __BEGIN__;
3899
3900 cvWriteInt( fs, "best_tree_idx", pruned_tree_idx );
3901
3902 cvStartWriteStruct( fs, "nodes", CV_NODE_SEQ );
3903 write_tree_nodes( fs );
3904 cvEndWriteStruct( fs );
3905
3906 __END__;

3909
3910CvDTreeSplit* CvDTree::read_split( CvFileStorage* fs, CvFileNode* fnode )
3911{
3912 CvDTreeSplit* split = 0;
3913
3914 CV_FUNCNAME( "CvDTree::read_split" );
3915
3916 __BEGIN__;
3917
3918 int vi, ci;
3919
3920 if( !fnode || CV_NODE_TYPE(fnode->tag) != CV_NODE_MAP )
3921 CV_ERROR( CV_StsParseError, "some of the splits are not stored properly" );
3922
3923 vi = cvReadIntByName( fs, fnode, "var", -1 );
3924 if( (unsigned)vi >= (unsigned)data->var_count )
3925 CV_ERROR( CV_StsOutOfRange, "Split variable index is out of range" );
3926
3927 ci = data->get_var_type(vi);
3928 if( ci >= 0 ) // split on categorical var
3929 {
3930 int i, n = data->cat_count->data.i[ci], inversed = 0, val;
3931 CvSeqReader reader;
3932 CvFileNode* inseq;
3933 split = data->new_split_cat( vi, 0 );
3934 inseq = cvGetFileNodeByName( fs, fnode, "in" );
3935 if( !inseq )
3936 {
3937 inseq = cvGetFileNodeByName( fs, fnode, "not_in" );
3938 inversed = 1;
3939 }
3940 if( !inseq ||
3941 (CV_NODE_TYPE(inseq->tag) != CV_NODE_SEQ && CV_NODE_TYPE(inseq->tag) != CV_NODE_INT))
3942 CV_ERROR( CV_StsParseError,
3943 "Either 'in' or 'not_in' tags should be inside a categorical split data" );
3944
3945 if( CV_NODE_TYPE(inseq->tag) == CV_NODE_INT )
3946 {
3947 val = inseq->data.i;
3948 if( (unsigned)val >= (unsigned)n )
3949 CV_ERROR( CV_StsOutOfRange, "some of in/not_in elements are out of range" );
3950
3951 split->subset[val >> 5] |= 1 << (val & 31);
3952 }
3953 else
3954 {
3955 cvStartReadSeq( inseq->data.seq, &reader );
3956
3957 for( i = 0; i < reader.seq->total; i++ )
3958 {
3959 CvFileNode* inode = (CvFileNode*)reader.ptr;
3960 val = inode->data.i;
3961 if( CV_NODE_TYPE(inode->tag) != CV_NODE_INT || (unsigned)val >= (unsigned)n )
3962 CV_ERROR( CV_StsOutOfRange, "some of in/not_in elements are out of range" );
3963
3964 split->subset[val >> 5] |= 1 << (val & 31);
3965 CV_NEXT_SEQ_ELEM( reader.seq->elem_size, reader );
3966 }
3967 }
3968
3969 // for categorical splits we do not use inversed splits,
3970 // instead we inverse the variable set in the split
3971 if( inversed )
3972 for( i = 0; i < (n + 31) >> 5; i++ )
3973 split->subset[i] ^= -1;
3974 }
3975 else
3976 {
3977 CvFileNode* cmp_node;
3978 split = data->new_split_ord( vi, 0, 0, 0, 0 );
3979
3980 cmp_node = cvGetFileNodeByName( fs, fnode, "le" );
3981 if( !cmp_node )
3982 {
3983 cmp_node = cvGetFileNodeByName( fs, fnode, "gt" );
3984 split->inversed = 1;
3985 }
3986
3987 split->ord.c = (float)cvReadReal( cmp_node );
3988 }
3989
3990 split->quality = (float)cvReadRealByName( fs, fnode, "quality" );
3991
3992 __END__;
3993
3994 return split;
3995}
3996
3997
3998CvDTreeNode* CvDTree::read_node( CvFileStorage* fs, CvFileNode* fnode, CvDTreeNode* parent )
3999{
4000 CvDTreeNode* node = 0;
4001
4002 CV_FUNCNAME( "CvDTree::read_node" );
4003
4004 __BEGIN__;
4005
4006 CvFileNode* splits;
4007 int i, depth;
4008
4009 if( !fnode || CV_NODE_TYPE(fnode->tag) != CV_NODE_MAP )
4010 CV_ERROR( CV_StsParseError, "some of the tree elements are not stored properly" );
4011
4012 CV_CALL( node = data->new_node( parent, 0, 0, 0 ));
4013 depth = cvReadIntByName( fs, fnode, "depth", -1 );
4014 if( depth != node->depth )
4015 CV_ERROR( CV_StsParseError, "incorrect node depth" );
4016
4017 node->sample_count = cvReadIntByName( fs, fnode, "sample_count" );
4018 node->value = cvReadRealByName( fs, fnode, "value" );
4019 if( data->is_classifier )
4020 node->class_idx = cvReadIntByName( fs, fnode, "norm_class_idx" );
4021
4022 node->Tn = cvReadIntByName( fs, fnode, "Tn" );
4023 node->complexity = cvReadIntByName( fs, fnode, "complexity" );
4024 node->alpha = cvReadRealByName( fs, fnode, "alpha" );
4025 node->node_risk = cvReadRealByName( fs, fnode, "node_risk" );
4026 node->tree_risk = cvReadRealByName( fs, fnode, "tree_risk" );
4027 node->tree_error = cvReadRealByName( fs, fnode, "tree_error" );
4028
4029 splits = cvGetFileNodeByName( fs, fnode, "splits" );
4030 if( splits )
4031 {
4032 CvSeqReader reader;
4033 CvDTreeSplit* last_split = 0;
4034
4035 if( CV_NODE_TYPE(splits->tag) != CV_NODE_SEQ )
4036 CV_ERROR( CV_StsParseError, "splits tag must stored as a sequence" );
4037
4038 cvStartReadSeq( splits->data.seq, &reader );
4039 for( i = 0; i < reader.seq->total; i++ )
4040 {
4041 CvDTreeSplit* split;
4042 CV_CALL( split = read_split( fs, (CvFileNode*)reader.ptr ));
4043 if( !last_split )
4044 node->split = last_split = split;
4045 else
4046 last_split = last_split->next = split;
4047
4048 CV_NEXT_SEQ_ELEM( reader.seq->elem_size, reader );
4049 }
4050 }
4051
4052 __END__;
4053
4054 return node;
4055}
4056
4057
4058void CvDTree::read_tree_nodes( CvFileStorage* fs, CvFileNode* fnode )
4059{
4060 CV_FUNCNAME( "CvDTree::read_tree_nodes" );
4061
4062 __BEGIN__;
4063
4064 CvSeqReader reader;
4065 CvDTreeNode _root;
4066 CvDTreeNode* parent = &_root;
4067 int i;
4068 parent->left = parent->right = parent->parent = 0;
4069
4070 cvStartReadSeq( fnode->data.seq, &reader );
4071
4072 for( i = 0; i < reader.seq->total; i++ )
4073 {
4074 CvDTreeNode* node;
4075
4076 CV_CALL( node = read_node( fs, (CvFileNode*)reader.ptr, parent != &_root ? parent : 0 ));
4077 if( !parent->left )
4078 parent->left = node;
4079 else
4080 parent->right = node;
4081 if( node->split )
4082 parent = node;
4083 else
4084 {
4085 while( parent && parent->right )
4086 parent = parent->parent;
4087 }
4088
4089 CV_NEXT_SEQ_ELEM( reader.seq->elem_size, reader );
4090 }
4091
4092 root = _root.left;
4093
4094 __END__;
4095}

4099{
4100 CvDTreeTrainData* _data = new CvDTreeTrainData();
4101 _data->read_params( fs, fnode );
4102
4103 read( fs, fnode, _data );
4104 get_var_importance();
4105}

4108// a special entry point for reading weak decision trees from the tree ensembles
4109void CvDTree::read( CvFileStorage* fs, CvFileNode* node, CvDTreeTrainData* _data )
4110{
4111 CV_FUNCNAME( "CvDTree::read" );
4112
4113 __BEGIN__;
4114
4115 CvFileNode* tree_nodes;
4116
4117 clear();
4118 data = _data;
4119
4120 tree_nodes = cvGetFileNodeByName( fs, node, "nodes" );
4121 if( !tree_nodes || CV_NODE_TYPE(tree_nodes->tag) != CV_NODE_SEQ )
4122 CV_ERROR( CV_StsParseError, "nodes tag is missing" );
4123
4124 pruned_tree_idx = cvReadIntByName( fs, node, "best_tree_idx", -1 );
4125 read_tree_nodes( fs, tree_nodes );
4126
4127 __END__;
4128}
